story:
As a new mum, Amy was on a quest to find healthy food for her child. After 3 years of research and development, she created Baby Brain Organics. It's a simple way to add nutrition to a child's meal. Baby Brain Organics is specially blended seeds full of protein, omega-3 fatty acids, antioxidants, fiber and iron - giving children the essential building blocks for a healthy brain and body.

Parents love the product! It's easy - by adding one tablespoon to pureed baby food, cereal, smoothies, baking, hamburgers (almost anything!) and it instantly makes meals much more nutritious! And it’s terrific for the whole family!

The company is growing. Amy has teamed up with another mum, Christine, and together they are reaching more children with Baby Brain Organics.

Overwhelmingly, they hear from their customers that they want a healthy snack for kids. The granola bars on the market today are loaded with sugar and ingredients they can't pronounce. 

Baby Brain Organics is ready to take the next step -- a healthy snack for busy families. Working with a nutritionist they have created delicious and nutritious bars! Their own kids love them! 

We need your help to get these bars on shelves and into little hands!

story:
Our Story

Imagine a place where survivors of childhood sexual abuse (CSA) can reclaim the joy of childhood. Imagine a place where they can find confidence through the power of choice, find healing through the power of art and find hope through the power of community. Imagine Camp CADI!  

Camp CADI is an amazing camp for girls ages 8-18 that have been traumatized by childhood sexual abuse.  Each year we hold a week long camp that gives the girls an escape and a place to heal from their trauma.  By pairing art and music therapy, story telling, camp activities, and traditional therapies we try to teach the girls that they are not to blame; and what happened to them does not define who they are.

Sadly, like most non-profit organizations we have run into the problem of little to no funding.  While getting organized for Camp CADI 2014 we have realized the price of camp has outreached the means of our organization.  Most of the girls and their families do not have the means to pay for camp themselves, and we have never denied any girl from experiencing the wonderful benefits of our camp due to money.  This is where you come in, we need your help to save Camp CADI 2014.  Any donation will help, both small and big!  If you would like to help save the lives of childhood sexual abuse survivors, and give them a chance to take back their childhood please donate!

How your donations will help us

This year camp is being held at Cedar Creek Ranch in Tennesse, offering the girls a chance to experince equestrian therapy.  Your generously donated funds will help us pay for a van to transport the girls to camp, airfare for several of our therapists and campers who live out of state, art supplies, facility usage, and meals for each camper throughout the week.  

    Risks & Challenges

    We are a very small non-profit and every year we are challenged by lack of funding.  Each year we get more requests from girls asking to attend camp, and this growth is usually stunted by our lack of funding.  It is our goal to help as many girls as possible by combining expressive therapy and a camp like atmosphere.  Your donations will allow our organization to overcome these hurdles, and expand our ability to help these girls!

Imagine a place where they can find confidence through the power of choice, find healing through the power of art and find hope through the power of community. Imagine Camp CADI!  Camp CADI is an amazing camp for girls ages 8-18 that have been traumatized by childhood sexual abuse.  Each year we hold a week long camp that gives the girls an escape and a place to heal from their trauma.  By pairing art and music therapy, story telling, camp activities, and traditional therapies we try to teach the girls that they are not to blame; and what happened to them does not define who they are.Sadly, like most non-profit organizations we have run into the problem of little to no funding.  While getting organized for Camp CADI 2014 we have realized the price of camp has outreached the means of our organization.  Most of the girls and their families do not have the means to pay for camp themselves, and we have never denied any girl from experiencing the wonderful benefits of our camp due to money.  This is where you come in, we need your help to save Camp CADI 2014.  Any donation will help, both small and big!  If you would like to help save the lives of childhood sexual abuse survivors, and give them a chance to take back their childhood please donate!   How your donations will help us This year camp is being held at Cedar Creek Ranch in Tennesse, offering the girls a chance to experince equestrian therapy.  Your generously donated funds will help us pay for a van to transport the girls to camp, airfare for several of our therapists and campers who live out of state, art supplies, facility usage, and meals for each camper throughout the week.    Risks & Challenges We are a very small non-profit and every year we are challenged by lack of funding.  Each year we get more requests from girls asking to attend camp, and this growth is usually stunted by our lack of funding.  It is our goal to help as many girls as possible by combining expressive therapy and a camp like atmosphere.  Your donations will allow our organization to overcome these hurdles, and expand our ability to help these girls!

story:
New Discoveries Regarding How Fluids (such as Wind and Water) Flow

New Discoveries regarding the movement of fluids such as wind or water by Physicist and Inventor, Robert D. Hunt have vast implications for the design of hundreds of devices we use everyday. However, the greatest contribution is most likely to come from: new aircraft and sea glider designs: new wind turbine designs; new wing designs; and new vacuum valve deigns.

How fluids flow at higher speeds affects the design criteria of flight in regard to wings, aircraft bodies and helicopter blades; and, is required in the design of wind turbines and wind turbine blades, as well as power turbine blades and anything else that involves high velocity fluid flow. It is extremely important that we have a correct model with which to improve the design of numerous products in common use. 

The most important finding of Mr. Hunt's private research is that DRAG IS THE TRUE CAUSE OF NEGATIVE PRESSURE IN FLOWING FLUIDS such as wind or water and not an increase in velocity as has been mistakenly believed for over 275 years. 

Obviously these New Discoveries relate to the physics of how how vacuums are formed, how drag is created as wings move through air or as wind turbine blades rotate in a body of fixed air, or a propeller in water, how turbine engines create thrust and much more, which matters a very great deal to our future technological development in efficient flight and power generation, especially renewable energy.

Hunt claims that his personal laboratory tests disprove Bernoulli’s Law and maintains that current understandings of fluid dynamics are incorrect. “It is imperative to get it right! Otherwise none of these devices will ever attain their true potential and their development will forever forward be held back due to outdated antiquated incorrect assumptions based on faulty science performed centuries ago” he concluded.

One of the new designs inspired by the New Discoveries is the Hunt Vacuum Valve that is featured in our video. The Hunt Vacuum Valve  is the first valve capable of creating suction since the creation of the Venturi valve in 1797 -- two hundred seventeen (217) years ago.

Mr. Hunt's New Discoveries in Fluid Dynamics are far reaching and create a new scientific model that holds the potential to further the science of fluid dynamics for centuries to come. Which should give you good reason to support this campaign to advance development of Mr. Hunt's groundbreaking research that will forever improve the science of fluid flow.

REFERRAL PERKS

Our REFERRAL PERKS are designed to give you real incentive to help us, while helping yourself. Select one of our Referral Perks and hit the Facebook, Google, and Tweeter social network buttons. Help develop technology that will allow millions access to clean energy-free drinking water, provide funds to research technology that has the potential to improve wing designs, create more efficient means of flight with all new aircraft designs, and advance wind turbine designs, and more efficiently generate power and possibly much more. 


Our REFERRAL PERKS offer the most generous incentives for making referrals available and for donating by purchasing your Referral Perk. Choose the program that is right for you. The larger the amount of the referral perk you purchase; the larger percentage you get of funds received from others using your referral code that you get when you make your Referral Perk Contribution. You will be paid in cash at the end of the campaign or sooner after we have time to validate the contributions of others that use your referral code.

We believe that our REFERRAL PERKS are only fair. Your efforts are EXTREMELY important to the success of our campaign. And, we want to reward you for all your hard work in helping us get the message out about our groundbreaking new discoveries that hold the potential to make the entire world better, greener, and more prosperous by reducing energy costs, which creates jobs and increases productivity. Let's make the world better together!

Important Notice: Send us an email at robert@crowddemo.com to let us know where to remit funds after you purchase a Referral Perk as Indiegogo does not provide it and we need your contact information to pay you. They do, however, track purchases made by your referrals.

Indiegogo has provided Social Network buttons to assist with your referrals. To use your REFERRAL PERKS: Sign into your Indiegogo account; Purchase the REFERRAL PERK of your choice; Then, simply hit the Social Network keys such as Facebook; Twitter, etc. Indiegogo will track the results and we will credit your account as responders from your referrals make purchases themselves that will be acknowledged on Indiegogo.

Private Lists and Social Networks without an Indiegogo Button

We realize that you most likely have your private email lists and other social networks such as LinkedIn for which there are no Indiegogo buttons available. In which case upon purchasing your REFERRAL PERK, we will assist you in sending out emails to your friends, family, business associates, etc. and privately track the results, including email lists extracted from your contacts on LinkedIn for example. 

So don't worry that a social network button is not available on Indiegogo. We will help you make contact with all of your associates using their emails with your private message that you compose and a link to this campaign.

All of their Purchases will still be processed through Indiegogo and credited to you for Cash Back Payment, using our proprietary application and accounting process.

robert@crowddemo.com

We want to do everything that we can to help you help us, so send the Campaign Manager Robert Hunt, II a private at the email address about with your questions for more information regarding our private email lists Referral Support at:

Drag VS Friction

Drag increases exponentially as the velocity increases and it is drag that is the only true cause of a negative pressure in flowing fluids – not the change in velocity itself but the creation of drag being “boundary layer effect” exhibited on the exterior of a fluid only. Therefore increasing the velocity only reduces the pressure as measured at the boundary layer between two fluids or of a fluid and a solid surface. The central body of the fluid increases in pressure. And, the overall effect of increasing the velocity of a fluid is an increase in pressure in direct ratio thereto in accordance with Newton’s Laws of Motions and more specifically Newton’s Law of Inertia.

Changing the velocity from 10 miles per hour to 320 miles per hour increases the drag by 4 billion times. Friction on the other hand is fractional to drag and remains relatively constant with increased velocity. There is a major difference between the magnitude of drag and friction as velocity increases.

Friction’s ability to hold back an aircraft for example is minimal while drag increases rapidly with increased velocity until there is not enough engine power to travel faster; and, the “drag limit” is reached, which limits the ability for ultra-high velocity transport of aircraft or any other objects moving through a fluid, such as wind or water.

The result of which clearly indicates that an engineer must first understand how and where drag is created in order to either increase or to decrease the amount of drag. Until then he does not have the right tools with which to work. The vacuum valve and a vertical axis wind and water turbines that beneficially use drag are two examples of designs in which it is desirable to increase drag to improve their performance.

In opposition, wings, boats, submarines, horizontal axis wind turbines (use the principal of lift to work), cars and trucks, trains all wish to reduce the amount of drag. All of these items where designed to increase or decrease drag can be improved due these New Discoveries made by Mr. Hunt

Novel Vacuum Valve

Our new vacuum valve provides a means to pump liquids to the surface from a reservoir using the heat energy contained in the liquids (even ultra low-temperature heat) that alone has enormous application in the production of fresh potable water for developing countries and holds great potential for lowing the costs of pumping water and of lowering the costs of producing oil and gas.

The Hunt valve is designed to overcome the limitation caused by constriction of the fluid by forming a large diameter flow "ring" that allows far greater flow rates; and, provides far greater surface area to beneficially produce much greater volume of boundary layer drag suction; and, gives an open center area to allow the suction fluid to readily mix with the motive fluid.

However, the Hunt Vacuum Valve is only one of many useful devices that can be created due to our new discoveries regarding fluid dynamics. Aircraft and their wings can be designed much more efficiently. In coming campaigns (each of which will begin with the title "New Fluid Discoveries"), we will explore several new wing and wind turbine designs in more detail and build and evaluate models of them, along with a novel wind turbine concept that has the potential to outperform existing models that is designed to use drag beneficially. We need your support to get there both now and the future. So, join  in with us. 

Your help is in regard to much more than just the Hunt Vacuum Valve (although the valve is extremely important to the developing world but will make a large impact on the industrial world as well). Our new discoveries are also about bringing to life a new understanding of fluid dynamics, with all of its crucially important ramifications in regard to fight, power generation, reducing the costs of producing fresh water as well as the costs of oil and gas production.

The Effect of Drag

However, without understanding that drag is the true cause of suction or vacuum (negative pressure) in flowing fluids, it not possible to understand how our new vacuum valve works to create negative pressure by working together with inertia that keeps the driving gas or liquid moving forward so that it does not turn back and fill the center area, as drag provides suction within the center area.

Think of a fire hose at 75 psi shooting a stream of water outward 150 feet into the air. Then, imagine the extremely high level of inertia and drag that is possible within a water or oil well at ten thousand feet of depth having over 4,000 psi of  hydrostatic head pressure of a liquid pumped down from the surface to shoot the liquid ahead with enormous force yielding an incredibly powerful suction or vacuum!

Drag only applies to high velocity flow. High velocity flow creates a high level of inertia that increases exponentially by the square of the velocity that causes the molecules to resist any change (so they keep going straight ahead), including a change in direction. Therefore the fast moving molecules continue to move past an area protected from the flow. While passing the shielded area, they pull molecules from the protected area due to the drag created as a result of the their high velocity flow. And, suction is created in the protected area.

The suction or pull (drag) that forms the vacuum in the protected area is due to the  effect of boundary layer viscous drag. In short; fluids are viscous (have viscosity) or they would not flow. At the interface of two moving fluids or a moving fluid and a solid object, the moving fluid pulls on the second fluid or solid object in the same direction as its flow or movement. In this way drag from stationary air holds an airplane back as the surfaces of its air-body and wings move through the air at high velocity. Its engine therefore must overpower drag in order to fly. Remember that all of the suction due to drag happens at the surface or boundary layer.

Why Hasn't it been Previously Known that Pressure Does not Drop when the Velocity of a Fluid Increases or that Drag is the True Cause of Negative Pressure?

Actually, it was known or believed right from the start that pressure increases with velocity and Newton's Law's of Motion in 1670 clearly state that the pressure increases as velocity increases. He also correctly deducted that direction is required to fully describe fluid flow within his laws. And, it was only later that it came to be believed that the pressure drops as the velocity increases and that pressure is a scale quantity that requires no direction (which actually is only true for static fluids and is not  true for moving dynamic fluids), which became the subject of a fierce scientific debate that has been going on unsettled for over 200 years.

In 1738, Daniel Bernoulli made the reading of lower pressure on the high velocity side of early "Venturi effect" style test equipment and jumped to the wrong conclusion as to why, without considering all the facts and because drag (one of the two causes) was not yet known. Actually both Bernoulli and Venturi missed the opportunity to realize the existence of drag; however, they should have realized the creation of back-pressure but failed to do so. 

Thereafter, devices were constructed that were claimed to work because of a reduction in pressure due to increasing a fluids velocity such as the Venturi valve that created suction. The first reading of blood pressure were also attributed to the Venturi effect. With such seemingly important evidence and with no other apparent answer (drag was not known and back-pressure was not diagnosed) as to why the Venturi meter or valve created suction. It became generally accepted as being correct that the pressure drops as the velocity increases and all of the evidence otherwise presented by Newton temporarily fell to way side -- although Newton's supporters strongly denounced Bernoulli's Principal at the time and for the next 100 years, their protests eventually fell away as the years passed.

Bernoulli was one of the first mathematicians to employ calculus working with integral equations that simply use two real numbers and then calculates any points in between them. Bernoulli used the lower pressure reading on high velocity and the higher pressure reading on the low velocity side of the Venturi effect and made those two numbers into a calculus formula, which in fact can be done for any two numbers. The two numbers were real pressure reading; however, the problem lies in the cause of the pressure readings, which Bernoulli readily attributed to velocity. As described herein, we are confident that we have proven otherwise.

Supporters of Newton's Laws of Momentum strongly criticized Bernoulli's Principal that was in stark contract to the teachings of Newton when it first came out, which led to years of fierce debate between factions within the scientific community. However, over time no one came forward with suitable explanations as to why the pressure was lower on the high velocity side of the Venturi meter and gradually Bernoulli's Principal generally became reluctantly accepted by the rest of the scientific community. 

With devices attributed to Bernoulli's Principal that work such as the Venturi vacuum valve, blood pressure instruments, wings, etc. and with mathematical formulas in place, Bernoulli's Principal has essentially gone unchallenged for over 275 years, which brings us forward to now.

Our team is bringing the first real challenge to Bernoulli's Principal after hundreds of years with understandable causes (other than velocity) for the lower pressure reading on the high velocity side of a Venturi valve that can be documented and supported by modern science. The effect of drag has become well known, but it still isn't fully realized that it is the true cause of negative pressure in flowing fluids. Most scientists still cling to the Bernoulli version of lower pressure being caused by an increase in velocity because that is what they have been taught and no one has previously shown otherwise.

We have pointed out that the point of measurement at which the pressure is read in a Venturi valve is at the boundary layer where drag occurs which lowers the pressure reading on the high velocity side as drag only occurs at high velocity. And we have shown back-pressure, being the pressure build-up within fluid molecules due to the constriction of flow area, within the Venturi valve is the cause of artificially higher pressure readings on the low velocity side of the valve.


These two scientific factors together explain the cause of lower pressure readings on the high velocity side and provide viable and believable alternate reasons as to why the pressure reading on the high velocity side is lower than on the low velocity side. And should provide sufficient cause for anyone with an open mind to question the validity of Bernoulli's Principal. And, if Bernoulli's Principal is disproved, everything designed using it as the underlying science is flawed, which creates an  immense opportunity to improve many of the devices we use and depend upon every day.  

When the Venturi meter or valve was created in approximately 1797, drag was unknown. The early scientist that observed drag for the first time did not realize what they were seeing and mistakenly thought that the reduction in pressure that occurred in the fluid that they had accelerated was due to the increase in velocity, without considering other causes such as:

  1. Back-Pressure caused by forcing a large flow area into a small area being somewhat like forcing five lanes of traffic into one lane. There is going to be a traffic jam. Additional force that causes a pressure build-up is needed to push the fluid into the smaller area called "back-pressure"; and,
  2. Their measurements were taken at the boundary layer where the moving air flow met the stationery air that was pulled along with the fast moving fluid's flow on the high velocity side by the effect of drag and not on the low velocity side because drag only forms as the velocity increases (which was not known then); and, (3) Due to the design of their particular test equipment that reduced the area of flow thereby creating back-pressure in the first place. How and why a fluid gains high velocity flow is not the question or consideration. 

The effect of drag as a function of boundary layer was first introduced by Prandtl in 1904, when man began to fly and when it was realized that at high speeds that an enormous resistance to forward moment occurred. So powerful was the force (which exponentially increases by the square of its velocity)  that scientists of the day predicted that man could never fly faster than the "sound barrier" being near 760 mph. Later jet engines provided the enormous power needed to do so. 

Over the years no scientist took the effort to recreate the experiment to determine if there might be other causes, instead of velocity to account for the lower pressure reading. A major reason for the long continued misconception is that when reading the pressure on the low velocity side of a Venturi meter or valve, it is actually higher than the pressure on the high velocity side, which appears to support the idea that there is a drop in pressure as the velocity increases. However the primary reason for the lower pressure reading on the high velocity side is that back-pressure forms going from a large area to a small area that causes restriction of flow and a buildup of pressure on the low velocity side.

They got a reading of lower pressure and jumped to a conclusion without considering other causes, such as back-pressure created by forcing a large flow area into a small area being somewhat like forcing five lanes of traffic into one lane. There is going to be a traffic jam. Additional force is needed to push the fluid into the smaller area called "back-pressure". Back-pressure and boundary layer effect viscous drag (on the high velocity side causing negative pressure) combined to cause the higher pressure reading on the low velocity side. Back-pressure was not considered as perhaps it should have been and boundary layer drag was not known. And, back pressure causes a loss of energy doing work on the fluid that dissipates as heat; and, thereby, energy is wasted and is never recovered, which is what occurs within the Venturi valve that explains its poor performance, especially at higher pressures.

Bernoulli did contribute to our understanding of fluid dynamics by being the first scientist to realize that reducing the cross flow area causes an increase in velocity, even if he did not identify back-pressure as the cause of the higher pressure reading on the low velocity side of the test apparatus and the energy losses that it causes as it compresses the fluid to higher pressure (that dissipates as heat) or realize the creation of viscous drag as being the cause of negative pressure in regard to high velocity fluid flow .

Doing the Original Experiments Again to Gain New Understanding!

After years of not being able to understand why the Bernoulli's Principal and the kinetic formula that uses Newton's Laws of Motion were in such contrast, Mr. Hunt decided to recreate the original experiments in late 2013. In doing so, he discovered the formation of back-pressure as the cause of an artificial high pressure reading on the low velocity side of their test equipment in the first hour after testing began.


There is no real excuse why back-pressure was not realized by early experimenters or by other scientist much earlier than our recent discovery.

Robert D. Hunt and Mark Leslie experimentally determined that pressure build-up was the cause of higher pressure reading during laboratory experiments on the Venturi effect, which led to a greater understanding of fluid dynamics; and, to the discovery that drag is the cause of negative pressure within flowing fluids; and, to the invention of the Hunt Vacuum valve.

How Fluids Act at Different Velocities is the Real Consideration

The real consideration is how a fluid acts or functions at different velocities and that is what is important for us to understand. Early experimenters, such as Bernoulli and Venturi, totally lost sight of that important consideration, which they missed I believe due to their focus on increasing a fluid's velocity by reducing its cross flow area. And, failed to  identify either back-pressure or the effect of boundary layer drag created at their measuring point on the high velocity side after doing so.

Forget how velocity is attained. Simply measure the attributes of the free open flow (not within an area of decreasing area of flow that skews the results) of air or water, such as its pressure being its force applied per unit area; its speed of movement; the level of inertia; and the level of kinetic energy with the direction of flow straight ahead (optimum 90 degree vector angle). Then speed the flow up with an air fan or water pump and you will see all of those attributes rise uniformly together. All of these attributes operate in unison and have continuity, as each is dependent upon the other as is taught within Newton's Laws of Momentum. Pressure for example can not drop while force increases as pressure is merely the force divided into a series of units that when combined are equal to the total force applied.

It is really that simple. If you do so, you can also readily determine that the pressure of the fluid at twice the velocity possess four times the pressure / force of the original fluid, as the pressure per unit area increases by the square of the velocity. This is commonly used in making wind power calculations at different wind velocities and is well known within the art.

So How Realistic is it to think that the Pressure of a Fluid Falls as its Velocity Increases with Such Empirical Evidence Surrounding us that Shows Otherwise?

The answer is that it is not and never has been. There is no scientific underlying reason whatsoever as to why a high velocity fluid should drop in pressure. And, it is in conflict with the important teaching of Newton the greatest scientist of all time who was the master at understanding motion. The only evidence supporting the notion is the flawed original Venturi effect experiment that is analyzed above and is shown to be incorrect for the reasons indicated.

How a fluid increases in velocity has no meaning at all (unless it creates back-pressure in the process to give false readings of course). The question is how does a fluid act after it increases in velocity or changes direction, etc. -- the results before and after are the key to understanding the true nature of fluid dynamics, along with also realizing that negative pressure is caused by drag; not any change in velocity.

Measurements taken (without forming back-pressure) show that the internal pressure of a high velocity fluid is higher in accordance with Newton's Laws of Motion; and, demonstrate that the outer pressure or boundary layer is lower due to viscous drag. High velocity fluid flow is ordered flow having uniform straight forward motion with all of its force directly ahead due to its high level of inertia, which causes a substantial increase of pressure within the center central body of flow. High velocity forward momentum forms boundary layer drag induced suction or vacuum along its surface interface with a solid surface or with the surface of another fluid or with the surface of a stationery body of the same fluid. 

High velocity flow has a higher pressure central body of flow than does a flow at lower velocity. The lower velocity flow has minimal drag induced suction at its surface boundary; and, high velocity flow has exponentially greater suction at its boundary layer in direct proportion to the square of the increase in velocity difference of the two fluid flows. This suction or vacuum is the true cause of lower pressure in regard to high velocity flow.

Newton correctly identified the characteristics of fluids, including the requirment of direction, within his Laws of Motion. Newton was right all along. Bernoulli and Venturi got it wrong because they made the wrong conclusions in answering as to why the pressure reading was lower on the high velocity side being:  (1) the design of their test apparatus, which was the cause of back-pressure being created in the first place; and, (2) the creation of boundary layer drag on the high velocity side due to increased velocity, which is the true cause of negative pressure in flowing fluids!

Newton, by all accounts the greatest physicist of all time and the inventor of calculus, corrected believed that there is a continuity (or conservation) associated with momentum. His belief of continuity of motion was that energy in the form of force or pressure in a specific direction is needed to accelerate an object whereby its inertia increases (resistance to change), its velocity increases, its force increases, its pressure (merely a measure of the force divided into units of area) increases, and its kinetic energy of motion increases in uniformity. And there is no difference between solids, liquids and gases in regard to these laws of motion.

Likewise to decrease the object's velocity back to its original state precisely the same amount of resistance force / pressure in exactly the opposite direction, being exactly the same amount of energy as input are given back or is conserved. Newton's Laws of Motion were the basis of Einstein's Theory of Relativity to which he gave credit to Newton. If pressure were to drop (pressure being a measure of force units over a specific area) while force, inertia and energy increased, then there would be no continuity or conservation of motion or of energy! Basically it would be impractical.

Those who came later and suggested that as the velocity of a fluid increases its pressure (which is merely units of force) decreases were in direct conflict with Newton's Laws of Motion (1687) and implies that the force also decreases. This scientific debate has been going on for over 300 years. Anyone in the wind turbine business will quickly tell you that the energy of the wind rises as the wind's velocity increases. If the pressure (units of force per area) of the wind drops with velocity, then why do hurricanes and tornadoes destroy everything in their path?.

Newton made the claim that Leibniz and the Bernoulli family of mathematicians plagiarized his work and distorted it after he showed the math of calculus to Leibniz. Later The Royal Academy of Sciences ruled Newton to the be the true inventor of calculus and correct in his conclusions regarding motion but that did not end the argument. It is still an open wound in the scientific community whereby both sides claim victory and science simply ignores the glaring conflict. Please support our work to determine the true nature of fluid dynamics and to resolve this crucially important issue for once and all.

The answer we believe lies in the understanding that drag is the true cause of suction and that drag only occurs at the boundary layer during high velocity flow; and the central body's fluid pressure increases as its velocity increases while the surface or boundary pressure decreases. Lower pressure only occurs at the surface due to the effect of boundary layer drag. And that drag is the true cause of suction or vacuum negative pressure in flowing fluids. And we believe that Newton was right all alone in regards to pressure of a flowing fluid increasing as it accelerates, which he clearly stated!

If Newton was correct and we are correct, then it becomes evident that we have been using the wrong scientific basis for the design of items that involve high velocity flow. We have been adding drag to our design of wings for example by adding cantilever (a hump on the upper surface of the wing) in regard to flawed principals of fluid flow, such as Bernoulli's Law that cause very little lift and dramatically increase drag until the point of stall unnecessarily. Newton's equal and opposite reaction of forcing air downward is the main cause of lift.


Our research is also about resolving old scientific debates that have been going on for hundreds of years through new discoveries with conclusive scientific proof, including but not limited to:

  1. Understanding that drag is the true cause of negative pressure (suction or vacuum) in flowing fluids; and,
  2. Bernoulli's Principal is incorrect -- the force and pressure of a fluid increases instead of decreases as the velocity of a fluid increases, instead of decreases as Bernoulli believed and is currently taught; and,
  3. Flowing fluids require degrees of direction known as "force vector angles" to be fully described and are thereby vector quantities and are not scalar quantities (described merely by a number on a scale such as the temperature) as Bernoulli  previously thought; and,
  4. Increasing the velocity of a fluid creates ordered flow (in much the same manner as occurs with random light that is transformed within a laser into a laser beam having direction and greater amplified force in the forward direction or in the same way that a high pressure water jet cutter having high velocity can cut through steel or solid concrete). All the molecules move uniformly together is a straight organized fashion and apply all of their force directly ahead, as compared to a stationery fluid having random movement and applying force equally in all directions. The ordered state of flow created by inducing high velocity flow causes a substantial increase (amplification) of the pressure within the center central body of flow. Meanwhile, the forward momentum or velocity forms boundary layer drag induced suction or vacuum along its surface interface with a solid surface or with the surface of another fluid or with the surface of a stationery body of the same fluid.

These above theories may be considered radical by some at this time, which is why we need your help to further prove otherwise. We have already proven the science to our own satisfaction in our own laboratory experiments and are confident we are going in the right direction. The next step is to create a sufficient body of empirical evidence in order to convince the entire scientific community because it is that important.

Now we need your help to go to the next stages of performing additional work such as test trails conducted in association with university research teams; and, preparation of scientific technical papers in order to inform the scientific community; computer modeling; and, development funds to build additional prototypes of new wing designs; wind turbine designs, new aircraft designs, etc. that are dictated through the science of our new discoveries. Old designs are based on fluid dynamic principals that are incorrect or incomplete; and, therefore, logically can not possibly meet their full potential. Help us get it right!

About the Inventor

Physicist and Inventor Robert D. Hunt is a leading expert on fluid dynamics. He started his career as a nuclear engineer in 1969 designing reactors for the aircraft carrier the USS Nimitz; was the first to commercially spawn the salt water fish species Redfish in 1986 and patented an artificial gas lift system that using liquid oxygen that supersaturates water with oxygen to hold record high fish densities and to pump or circulate water; holds world’s records in geothermal low temperature power generation generating enough power for a home from 92 degree water at this fish farm; has generated power from the heat energy in the air with his cryogenic thermoelectric generator that was powered by ambient air with heat rejection to -380 deg. F. liquid oxygen as it was converted to oxygen gas to support fish life; is the creator of the Atmospheric Thermal Energy Conversion (ATEC) that is a novel power cycle to fly using heat from the air via the gravityplane that beneficially uses gravity as part of the process; conducted over twenty years of work in kinetic renewable energy wind research and over ten years of intensive work on kinetic engine development being the inventor of the Free Piston Engine that has been tested at the highest ever mechanical efficiency for a piston style engine of 92% efficient that is equal to the highest precision turbine engines ever built. 

Mark Leslie, a long time research associate said, “Robert is one of the great thinkers of our day and has boundless curiosity. He is not bound by what other scientists say you can do or not do and runs experiments to accurately figure it out for himself when in doubt. When others said you cannot gain benefit from gravity, he created an aircraft the gravityplane that rises into the sky by buoyancy without the need of a power source and then glides back to earth like a glider and a geothermal power cycle that almost double their power output by using thermodynamics and gravity beneficially working in unison”.

Mr. Hunt's New Discoveries in Fluid Dynamics are far reaching and create a new scientific model
that holds the potential to further the science of fluid dynamics for centuries
to come. Which should give you good reason to support this campaign to advance development of Mr. Hunt's groundbreaking research that will forever improve the science of fluid flow. 

REFERRAL PERKS



 Our REFERRAL PERKS are designed to give you real incentive to 
help us, while helping yourself. Select one of our Referral Perks and hit the Facebook, Google, and Tweeter social network buttons. Help develop technology that will allow 
millions access to clean energy-free drinking water, provide funds to research technology that has
 the potential to improve wing designs, create more efficient means of flight with all new aircraft designs, and advance wind turbine designs, and more efficiently generate power and possibly much 
more. 



Our
REFERRAL PERKS offer the most generous incentives for making referrals available and for donating by purchasing your Referral Perk.
Choose the program that is right for you. The larger the amount of the referral perk you purchase; the
larger percentage you get of funds received from others using your referral code that you get when you make your Referral Perk Contribution. You will be paid in cash at the end of the campaign or sooner after we have time to validate the contributions of others that use your referral code.We believe that our REFERRAL PERKS are only fair. Your efforts are EXTREMELY important to the success of our campaign. And, we want to reward you 
for all your hard work in helping us get the message out about our 
groundbreaking new discoveries that hold the potential to make the 
entire world better, greener, and more prosperous by reducing energy 
costs, which creates jobs and increases productivity. Let's make the 
world better together!
Important Notice: Send us an email at robert@crowddemo.com to let us know where to remit funds after you purchase a Referral Perk as Indiegogo does not provide it and we need your contact information to pay you. They do, however, track purchases made by your referrals.

Indiegogo has provided Social Network buttons to assist with your referrals. To use your REFERRAL PERKS: Sign into your Indiegogo account; Purchase the REFERRAL PERK of your choice; Then, simply hit the Social Network keys such as Facebook; Twitter, etc. Indiegogo will track the results and we will credit your account as responders from your referrals make purchases themselves that will be acknowledged on Indiegogo.
Private Lists and Social Networks without an Indiegogo Button

We realize that you most likely have your private email lists and other social networks such as LinkedIn for which there are no Indiegogo buttons available. In which case upon purchasing your REFERRAL PERK, we will assist you in sending out emails to your friends, family, business associates, etc. and privately track the results, including
email lists extracted from your contacts on LinkedIn for example. 
So don't worry that a social network button is not available on Indiegogo. We will help you make contact with all of your associates using their emails with your private message that you compose and a link to this campaign.
 All of their Purchases will still be processed through Indiegogo and credited to you for Cash Back Payment, using our proprietary application and accounting process.
robert@crowddemo.com
 We want to do everything that we can to help you help us, so send the Campaign Manager Robert Hunt, II a private at the email address about with your questions for more information regarding our private email lists Referral Support at:


Drag VS Friction
Drag increases exponentially as the velocity increases and
it is drag that is the only true cause of a negative pressure in flowing fluids
– not the change in velocity itself but the creation of drag being “boundary
layer effect” exhibited on the exterior of a fluid only. Therefore increasing
the velocity only reduces the pressure as measured at the boundary layer
between two fluids or of a fluid and a solid surface. The central body of the
fluid increases in pressure. And, the overall effect of increasing the velocity
of a fluid is an increase in pressure in direct ratio thereto in accordance
with Newton’s Laws of Motions and more specifically Newton’s Law of Inertia.

Changing the velocity from 10 miles per hour to 320 miles
per hour increases the drag by 4 billion times. Friction on the other hand is
fractional to drag and remains relatively constant with increased velocity. There
is a major difference between the magnitude of drag and friction as velocity
increases.

Friction’s ability to hold back an aircraft for example is
minimal while drag increases rapidly with increased velocity until there is not
enough engine power to travel faster; and, the “drag limit” is reached, which limits
the ability for ultra-high velocity transport of aircraft or any other objects
moving through a fluid, such as wind or water.


The result of which clearly indicates that an
engineer must first understand how and where drag is created in order to either
increase or to decrease the amount of drag. Until then he does not have the right
tools with which to work. The vacuum valve and a vertical axis wind and water turbines that beneficially use drag are two
examples of designs in which it is desirable to increase drag to improve their performance. 

In opposition,
wings, boats, submarines, horizontal axis wind turbines (use the principal of
lift to work), cars and trucks, trains all wish to reduce the amount of drag. All of these items where designed to increase
or decrease drag can be improved due these New Discoveries made by Mr. Hunt

Novel Vacuum Valve
Our new vacuum valve provides a means to pump liquids to the surface from a reservoir using the heat energy contained in the liquids (even ultra low-temperature heat) that alone has enormous application in the production of fresh potable water for developing countries and holds great potential for lowing the costs of pumping water and of lowering the costs of producing oil and gas.



The Hunt valve is designed to overcome the limitation caused by 
constriction of the fluid by forming a large diameter flow "ring" that 
allows far greater flow rates; and, provides far greater surface area to
 beneficially produce much greater volume of boundary layer drag 
suction; and, gives an open center area to allow the suction fluid to 
readily mix with the motive fluid.However, the Hunt Vacuum Valve is only one of many useful devices that can be created due to our new discoveries regarding fluid dynamics. Aircraft and their wings can be designed much more efficiently. In 
coming campaigns (each of which will begin with the title "New Fluid Discoveries"), we will explore several new wing and wind turbine 
designs in more detail and build and evaluate models of them, along with a novel wind turbine concept that has the potential to outperform existing models that is designed to use drag beneficially. We need 
your support to get there both now and the future. So, join  in with us.  Your help is in regard to much more than just the Hunt Vacuum Valve (although the valve is extremely important to the developing world but will make a large impact on the industrial world as well). Our new discoveries are also about bringing to life a new understanding 
of fluid dynamics, with all of its crucially important ramifications in 
regard to fight, power generation, reducing the costs of producing fresh
 water as well as the costs of oil and gas production. 
The Effect of Drag


 However, without understanding that drag is the true cause of suction or vacuum (negative pressure) in flowing fluids, it not possible to understand how our new vacuum valve works to create negative pressure by working together with inertia that keeps the driving gas or liquid moving forward so that it does not turn back and fill the center area, as drag provides suction within the center area. 
Think of a fire hose at 75 psi shooting a stream of water outward 150 feet into the air. Then, imagine the extremely high level of inertia and drag that is possible within a water or oil well at ten thousand feet of depth having over 4,000 psi of  hydrostatic head pressure of a liquid pumped down from the surface to shoot the liquid ahead with enormous force yielding an incredibly powerful suction or vacuum!
Drag only applies to high velocity flow. High velocity flow creates a high level of inertia that increases exponentially by the square of the velocity that causes the molecules to resist any change (so they keep going straight ahead), including a change in direction. Therefore the fast moving molecules continue to move past an area protected from the flow. While passing the shielded area, they pull molecules from the protected area due to the drag created as a result of the their high velocity flow. And, suction is created in the protected area. The suction or pull (drag) that forms the vacuum in the protected area is due to the  effect of boundary layer viscous drag. In short; fluids are viscous (have viscosity) or they would not flow. At the interface of two moving fluids or a moving fluid and a solid object, the moving fluid pulls on the second fluid or solid object in the same direction as its flow or movement. In this way drag from stationary air holds an airplane back as the surfaces of its air-body and wings move through the air at high velocity. Its engine therefore must overpower drag in order to fly. Remember that all of the suction due to drag happens at the surface or boundary layer.
Why Hasn't it been Previously Known that Pressure Does not Drop when the Velocity of a Fluid Increases or that Drag is the True Cause of Negative Pressure?
Actually, it was known or believed right from the start that pressure increases with velocity and Newton's Law's of Motion in 1670 clearly state that the pressure increases as velocity increases. He also correctly deducted that direction is required to fully describe fluid flow within his laws. And, it was only later that it came to be believed that the pressure drops as the velocity increases and that pressure is a scale quantity that requires no direction (which actually is only true for static fluids and is not  true for moving dynamic fluids), which became the subject of a fierce scientific debate that has been going on unsettled for over 200 years.
In 1738, Daniel Bernoulli made the reading of lower pressure on the high 
velocity side of early "Venturi effect" style test equipment and jumped to the wrong conclusion as to why, without 
considering all the facts and because drag (one of the two causes) was 
not yet known. Actually both Bernoulli and Venturi missed the opportunity to realize the 
existence of drag; however, they should have realized the creation of 
back-pressure but failed to do so. 
Thereafter, devices were constructed that were claimed to work because of a reduction in pressure due to increasing a fluids velocity such as the Venturi valve that created suction. The first reading of blood pressure were also attributed to the Venturi effect. With such seemingly important evidence and with no other apparent answer (drag was not known and back-pressure was not diagnosed) as to why the Venturi meter or valve created suction. It became generally accepted as being correct that the pressure drops as the velocity increases and all of the evidence otherwise presented by Newton temporarily fell to way side -- although Newton's supporters strongly denounced Bernoulli's Principal at the time and for the next 100 years, their protests eventually fell away as the years passed.
Bernoulli was one of the first mathematicians to employ calculus working with integral equations that simply use two real numbers and then calculates any points in between them. Bernoulli used the lower pressure reading on high velocity and the higher pressure reading on the low velocity side of the Venturi effect and made those two numbers into a calculus formula, which in fact can be done for any two numbers. The two numbers were real pressure reading; however, the problem lies in the cause of the pressure readings, which Bernoulli readily attributed to velocity. As described herein, we are confident that we have proven otherwise.
Supporters of Newton's Laws of Momentum strongly criticized Bernoulli's 
Principal that was in stark contract to the teachings of Newton when it first came out, which led to years of fierce debate between factions within 
the scientific community. However, over time no one came forward with suitable explanations as to why the pressure was lower on the high velocity side of the Venturi meter and gradually Bernoulli's Principal generally became reluctantly accepted by the rest of the scientific community.  
With devices attributed to Bernoulli's Principal that work such as the Venturi vacuum valve, blood pressure instruments, wings, etc. and with mathematical formulas in place, Bernoulli's Principal has essentially gone unchallenged for over 275 years, which brings us forward to now. 
Our team is bringing the first real challenge to Bernoulli's Principal after hundreds of years with understandable causes (other than velocity) for the lower pressure reading on the high velocity side of a Venturi valve that can be documented and supported by modern science. The effect of drag has become well known, but it still isn't fully realized that it is the true cause of negative pressure in flowing fluids. Most scientists still cling to the Bernoulli version of lower pressure being caused by an increase in velocity because that is what they have been taught and no one has previously shown otherwise. 
We have pointed out that the point of measurement at which the pressure is read in a Venturi valve is at the boundary layer where drag occurs which lowers the pressure reading on the high velocity side as drag only occurs at high velocity. And we have shown back-pressure, being the pressure build-up within fluid molecules due to the constriction of flow area, within the Venturi valve is the cause of artificially higher pressure readings on the low velocity side of the valve. 

These two scientific factors together explain the cause of lower pressure readings on the high velocity side and provide viable and believable alternate reasons as to why the pressure reading on the high velocity side is lower than on the low velocity side. And should provide sufficient cause for anyone with an open mind to question the validity of Bernoulli's Principal. And, if Bernoulli's Principal is disproved, everything designed using it as the underlying science is flawed, which creates an  immense opportunity to improve many of the devices we use and depend upon every day.  



When the Venturi meter or valve was created in approximately 1797, 
drag was unknown. The early scientist that observed drag for the first 
time did not realize what they were seeing and mistakenly thought that 
the reduction in pressure that occurred in the fluid that they had 
accelerated was due to the increase in velocity, without considering 
other causes such as: 


Back-Pressure caused by forcing a large flow area into a small area being somewhat 
like forcing five lanes of traffic into one lane. There is going to be a
 traffic jam. Additional force that causes a pressure build-up is needed to push the fluid into the 
smaller area called "back-pressure"; and,
Their measurements were taken at the boundary layer where the 
moving air flow met the stationery air that was pulled along with the 
fast moving fluid's flow on the high velocity side by the effect of drag
 and not on the low velocity side because drag only forms as the 
velocity increases (which was not known then); and, 
(3) Due to the design of their particular test equipment that reduced
 the area of flow thereby creating back-pressure in the first place. How
 and why a fluid gains high velocity flow is not the question or 
consideration. 

The effect of drag as a function of boundary layer was first introduced 
by Prandtl in 1904, when man began to fly and when it was realized that 
at high speeds that an enormous resistance to forward moment occurred. 
So powerful was the force (which exponentially increases by the square 
of its velocity)  that scientists of the day predicted that man could 
never fly faster than the "sound barrier" being near 760 mph. Later jet 
engines provided the enormous power needed to do so. 
Over the years no scientist took the effort to recreate the 
experiment to determine if there might be other causes, instead of 
velocity to account for the lower pressure reading.
A major reason for the long continued misconception is that when 
reading the pressure on the low velocity side of a Venturi meter or 
valve, it is actually higher than the pressure on the high velocity 
side, which appears to support the idea that there is a drop in pressure
 as the velocity increases. However the primary reason for the lower 
pressure reading on the high velocity side is that back-pressure forms 
going from a large area to a small area that causes restriction of flow 
and a buildup of pressure on the low velocity side. 
They got a reading of 
lower pressure and jumped to a conclusion without considering other 
causes, such as back-pressure created by forcing a large flow area into a
 small area being somewhat like forcing five lanes of traffic into one 
lane. There is going to be a traffic jam. Additional force is needed to 
push the fluid into the smaller area called "back-pressure". 
Back-pressure and boundary layer effect viscous drag (on the high 
velocity side causing negative pressure) combined to cause the higher 
pressure reading on the low velocity side. Back-pressure was not 
considered as perhaps it should have been and boundary layer drag was 
not known.
And, back pressure causes a loss of energy doing work on the 
fluid that dissipates as heat; and, thereby, energy is wasted and is 
never recovered, which is what occurs within the Venturi valve that 
explains its poor performance, especially at higher pressures. 
Bernoulli did contribute to our understanding of fluid dynamics by being
 the first scientist to realize that reducing the cross flow area causes an 
increase in velocity, even if he did not identify back-pressure as the 
cause of the higher pressure reading on the low velocity side of the 
test apparatus and the energy losses that it causes as it compresses the
 fluid to higher pressure (that dissipates as heat) or realize the 
creation of viscous drag as being the cause of negative pressure in 
regard to high velocity fluid flow . 
Doing the Original Experiments Again to Gain New Understanding!


After years of not being able to understand why the Bernoulli's Principal and the kinetic formula that uses Newton's Laws of Motion were in such contrast, Mr. Hunt decided to recreate the original experiments in late 2013. In doing so, he discovered the 
formation of back-pressure as the cause of an artificial high pressure 
reading on the low velocity side of their test equipment in the first 
hour after testing began. 
There is no real excuse why back-pressure
 was not realized by early experimenters or by other scientist much 
earlier than our recent discovery.Robert D. Hunt and Mark Leslie experimentally determined that pressure 
build-up was the cause of higher pressure reading during laboratory 
experiments on the Venturi effect, which led to a greater understanding 
of fluid dynamics; and, to the discovery that drag is the cause of 
negative pressure within flowing fluids; and, to the invention of the 
Hunt Vacuum valve.How Fluids Act at Different Velocities is the Real Consideration 

The real consideration is how a fluid acts or functions at different velocities and that is what is important for us to understand. Early experimenters, such as Bernoulli and Venturi, totally lost sight of that important consideration, which they missed I believe due to their focus on increasing a fluid's velocity by reducing its cross flow area. And, failed to  identify either back-pressure or the effect of boundary layer drag created at their measuring point on the high velocity side after doing so.
Forget how velocity is attained. Simply measure the attributes of the free open flow (not within an area of decreasing area of flow that skews the results) of air or water, such as its pressure being its force applied per unit area; its speed of movement; the level of inertia; and the level of kinetic energy with the direction of flow straight ahead (optimum 90 degree vector angle). Then speed the flow up with an air fan or water pump and you will see all of those attributes rise uniformly together. All of these attributes operate in unison and have continuity, as each is dependent upon the other as is taught within Newton's Laws of Momentum. Pressure for example can not drop while force increases as pressure is merely the force divided into a series of units that when combined are equal to the total force applied. 
It is really that simple. If you do so, you can also readily determine that the pressure of the fluid at twice the velocity possess four times the pressure / force of the original fluid, as the pressure per unit area increases by the square of the velocity. This is commonly used in making wind power calculations at different wind velocities and is well known within the art.
So How Realistic is it to think that the Pressure of a Fluid Falls as its Velocity Increases with Such Empirical Evidence Surrounding us that Shows Otherwise? 

The answer is that it is not and never has been. There is no scientific underlying reason whatsoever as to why a high velocity fluid should drop in pressure. And, it is in conflict with the important teaching of Newton the greatest scientist of all time who was the master at understanding motion. The only evidence supporting the notion is the flawed original Venturi effect experiment that is analyzed above and is shown to be incorrect for the reasons indicated.
How a fluid increases in velocity has no meaning at all (unless it 
creates back-pressure in the process to give false readings of course). 
The question is how does a fluid act after it increases in velocity or 
changes direction, etc. -- the results before and after are the key to 
understanding the true nature of fluid dynamics, along with also 
realizing that negative pressure is caused by drag; not any change in 
velocity.
Measurements taken (without forming back-pressure) 
show that the internal pressure of a high velocity fluid is higher in 
accordance with Newton's Laws of Motion; and, demonstrate that the outer pressure or boundary layer is lower
 due to viscous drag. High velocity fluid flow is ordered flow having uniform 
straight forward motion with all of its force directly ahead due to its high level of inertia, which causes a substantial increase of pressure within the center central
 body of flow. High velocity forward momentum forms boundary 
layer drag induced suction or vacuum along its surface interface with a 
solid surface or with the surface of another fluid or with the surface 
of a stationery body of the same fluid. 
High velocity flow has a higher pressure central body of flow than does a flow at lower velocity. The lower velocity flow has minimal drag induced suction at its surface boundary; and, high velocity flow has exponentially greater suction at its boundary layer in direct proportion to the square of the increase in velocity difference of the two fluid flows. This suction or vacuum is the true cause of lower pressure in regard to high velocity flow.
 Newton correctly identified the characteristics of fluids, including the requirment of direction, within his Laws of Motion. Newton was right all along. Bernoulli and Venturi got it wrong because they made the wrong conclusions in answering as to why the pressure reading was lower on the high velocity side being:  (1) the design of their test apparatus, which was the cause of back-pressure being created in the first place; and, (2) the creation of boundary layer drag on the high velocity side due to increased velocity, which is the true cause of negative pressure in flowing fluids!



Newton, by all accounts the greatest physicist of all time and the 
inventor of calculus, corrected believed that there is a continuity (or 
conservation) associated with momentum. His belief of continuity of 
motion was that energy in the form of force or pressure in a specific 
direction is needed to accelerate an object whereby its inertia 
increases (resistance to change), its velocity increases, its force 
increases, its pressure (merely a measure of the force divided into 
units of area) increases, and its kinetic energy of motion increases in 
uniformity. And there is no difference between solids, liquids and gases
 in regard to these laws of motion.

Likewise to decrease the object's velocity back to its original state
 precisely the same amount of resistance force / pressure in exactly the
 opposite direction, being exactly the same amount of energy as input 
are given back or is conserved. Newton's Laws of Motion were the basis 
of Einstein's Theory of Relativity to which he gave credit to Newton. If
 pressure were to drop (pressure being a measure of force units over a 
specific area) while force, inertia and energy increased, then there 
would be no continuity or conservation of motion or of energy! Basically
 it would be impractical.

Those who came later and suggested that as the velocity of a fluid 
increases its pressure (which is merely units of force) decreases were 
in direct conflict with Newton's Laws of Motion (1687) and implies that 
the force also decreases. This scientific debate has been going on for 
over 300 years. Anyone in the wind turbine business will quickly tell 
you that the energy of the wind rises as the wind's velocity increases. 
If the pressure (units of force per area) of the wind drops with 
velocity, then why do hurricanes and tornadoes destroy everything in 
their path?.

Newton made the claim that Leibniz and the Bernoulli family of 
mathematicians plagiarized his work and distorted it after he showed the
 math of calculus to Leibniz. Later The Royal Academy of Sciences ruled 
Newton to the be the true inventor of calculus and correct in his 
conclusions regarding motion but that did not end the argument. It is 
still an open wound in the scientific community whereby both sides claim
 victory and science simply ignores the glaring conflict. Please support
 our work to determine the true nature of fluid dynamics and to resolve 
this crucially important issue for once and all. 

The answer we believe lies in the understanding that drag is the true
 cause of suction and that drag only occurs at the boundary layer during
 high velocity flow; and the central body's fluid pressure increases as 
its velocity increases while the surface or boundary pressure decreases.
 Lower pressure only occurs at the surface due to the effect of boundary
 layer drag. And that drag is the true cause of suction or vacuum 
negative pressure in flowing fluids. And we believe that Newton was 
right all alone in regards to pressure of a flowing fluid increasing as 
it accelerates, which he clearly stated! 

If Newton was correct and we are correct, then it becomes evident 
that we have been using the wrong scientific basis for the design of 
items that involve high velocity flow. We have been adding drag to our 
design of wings for example by adding cantilever (a hump on the upper 
surface of the wing) in regard to flawed principals of fluid flow, such 
as Bernoulli's Law that cause very little lift and dramatically increase
 drag until the point of stall unnecessarily. Newton's equal and 
opposite reaction of forcing air downward is the main cause of lift.
Our research is also about resolving old scientific debates that have been going
 on for hundreds of years through new discoveries with conclusive scientific proof, including but not limited to: 


Understanding that drag is the true
 cause of negative pressure (suction or vacuum) in flowing fluids; and, 
Bernoulli's Principal is incorrect -- the force and pressure of a 
fluid increases instead of decreases as the velocity of a fluid 
increases, instead of decreases as Bernoulli believed and is currently 
taught; and, 
Flowing fluids require degrees of direction known as "force vector 
angles" to be fully described and are thereby vector quantities and are 
not scalar quantities (described merely by a number on a scale such as 
the temperature) as Bernoulli  previously thought; and,
Increasing the velocity of a fluid creates ordered flow (in much the
 same manner as occurs with random light that is transformed within a 
laser into a laser beam having direction and greater amplified force in 
the forward direction or in the same way that a high pressure water jet 
cutter having high velocity can cut through steel or solid concrete). 
All the molecules move uniformly together is a straight organized 
fashion and apply all of their force directly ahead, as compared to a 
stationery fluid having random movement and applying force equally in 
all directions. The ordered state of flow created by inducing high 
velocity flow causes a substantial increase (amplification) of the 
pressure within the center central body of flow. Meanwhile, the forward 
momentum or velocity forms boundary layer drag induced suction or vacuum
 along its surface interface with a solid surface or with the surface of
 another fluid or with the surface of a stationery body of the same 
fluid.

These above theories may be considered radical by some at this time, 
which is why we need your help to further prove otherwise. We have 
already proven the science to our own satisfaction in our own laboratory
 experiments and are confident we are going in the right direction. The 
next step is to create a sufficient body of empirical evidence in order 
to convince the entire scientific community because it is that 
important. 
Now we need your help to go to the next stages of performing 
additional work such as test trails conducted in association with 
university research teams; and, preparation of scientific technical 
papers in order to inform the scientific community; computer modeling; 
and, development funds to build additional prototypes of new wing 
designs; wind turbine designs, new aircraft designs, etc. that are 
dictated through the science of our new discoveries. Old designs are 
based on fluid dynamic principals that are incorrect or incomplete; and,
 therefore, logically can not possibly meet their full potential. Help 
us get it right!


About the Inventor
Physicist and Inventor Robert D. Hunt is a leading expert on
fluid dynamics. He started his career as a nuclear engineer in 1969 designing
reactors for the aircraft carrier the USS Nimitz; was the first to commercially spawn the salt water fish species
Redfish in 1986 and patented an artificial gas lift system that using liquid oxygen that supersaturates water with oxygen to hold record high fish densities and to pump or circulate water; holds world’s records in geothermal low temperature power generation generating enough power for a home from 92 degree water at this fish farm; has
generated power from the heat energy in the air with his cryogenic thermoelectric
generator that was powered by ambient air with heat rejection to -380 deg. F. liquid oxygen as it was converted to oxygen gas to support fish life; is the creator of the Atmospheric Thermal Energy Conversion (ATEC)
that is a novel power cycle to fly using heat from the air via the gravityplane
that beneficially uses gravity as part of the process; conducted over twenty
years of work in kinetic renewable energy wind research and over ten years of
intensive work on kinetic engine development being the inventor of the Free Piston Engine that has been tested at the highest ever mechanical efficiency for a piston style engine of 92% efficient that is equal to the highest precision turbine engines ever built.  
Mark Leslie, a long time research associate said, “Robert is
one of the great thinkers of our day and has boundless curiosity. He is not
bound by what other scientists say you can do or not do and runs experiments to
accurately figure it out for himself when in doubt. When others said you cannot
gain benefit from gravity, he created an aircraft the gravityplane that rises
into the sky by buoyancy without the need of a power source and then glides back to earth like a glider and a geothermal power
cycle that almost double their power output by using thermodynamics and gravity
beneficially working in unison”.

story:
Patrick Ngigi Mung'ere was recently diagnosed with Hodgkin's Lymphoma, a type of cancer originating from the white blood cells.

His medical analysis showed that he must complete 6 chemotherapy sessions. His insurance company covered the first session only. His family pooled resources for the second session.  He has 4 more sessions to go that need to be paid for and no further source of funds.  The sessions are 3 weeks apart and the next one is in two weeks.

Each session costs approximately US$500. We need to raise US$2000 for the 4 sessions remaining. So far the chemo sessions have been very good and he's shown great progress. His chances for a full recovery are very high. But the financial burden is taking a toll on Patrick and adding to his health challenges.  We'd like him to focus on beating the cancer and stop worrying about the funds for treatment.

As a family we can't do it alone. Please join us in helping Patrick complete the treatment. Whatever amount you can contribute will be immensely appreciated.

Please also get the word out and help us meet our goal.

Thank you. From Patrick's family.


UPDATE!!!! (August 7, 2014)

Thank you to all who've contributed to our fundraising. We greatly appreciate your support.

Below are images of Patrick in the chemotherapy room. He's doing much better.

He is progressing extremely well; his blood count is finally that of a perfectly healthy man.
