story:
For more information, visit maphealthwatch.com.

When we first came up with the idea for MAP Health Watcher, we thought we could use existing smartwatches to provide the data we needed to offer a cloud-based health service based on the latest data analysis techniques.

We soon realized, however, that the wearables on the market were not capable of delivering the quality of data needed for serious medical use. The sensors were imprecise and only provided very scattered data points, while none of the devices contained the combination of five sensors we wanted to use as the basis of the MAP Health Watcher service.

So we had to go into hardware development too – while our doctors and scientists were hard at work on refining the artificial intelligence algorithms and machine learning mechanisms, eliminating unwanted noise from the data and overcoming countless other issues.

This medical-grade wearable device is capable of delivering data of high-enough quality to support our cloud-based service driven by the state-of-the-art artificial intelligence.

 

 

Simply wearing the MAP Health Watch allows us to collect and process medical data in real time and respond immediately in the event of any issue of concern. If our algorithm recognizes any known pattern of a developing disease, we notify you and our medical team provides instant and tailored advice.

All this based on pioneering artificial intelligence developed by the MAP Health Watcher team.

When we ship your MAP Health Watch, you’ll be given the choice of a Gold ($30/month) or Platinum ($50/month) service pack. If you have signed up for a perk with 3 or 6 months' full service included, you will automatically receive the Silver pack, which is only available for Indiegogo backers.

 

HOW IT WORKS

 

 

 

MEDICAL CASES

 

Heart attack

A heart attack is caused by a blockage to the coronary arteries. This blockage often develops gradually over a number of years and can cause chest discomfort of varying severity.

A large number of heart attacks and sudden heart-related deaths could be prevented through the use of the MAP Health Watch.

Chest discomfort can have a variety of causes. It is extremely important to know whether any chest pains, breathing difficulties, numbness or tightening are occurring as a result of coronary artery disease. If the user experiences any of these complaints, the MAP Health Watch can help by taking an instant ECG reading. With the help of special algorithms, the data recorded is then immediately analyzed by health professionals. If there is any suspicion of an irregularity, the user is advised to consult a medical professional immediately. Treatment administered in good time can save lives and help ensure a long, full and active life for the user.

 

FALLS AND ROAD ACCIDENTS

With the help of its built-in gyroscope, the MAP Health Watch can immediately detect and send notifications of any falls, road accidents or other similar situations. This means allows assistance to be provided as soon as possible.

Falling down at home and not being able to call anyone for help is one of the biggest fears for elderly people who live alone. It is also normal for younger people to be afraid of having an accident and not having anyone around to provide assistance. In the event of loss of mobility or consciousness, the injured person is often unable to call for assistance at a time when every second counts. Professional help sent in time by the MAP Health Watcher team therefore has the potential to save thousands of lives.

 

DEHYDRATION

Dehydration is a huge and potentially life-threatening problem, especially for the elderly, but also for athletes, people who carry out physically demanding work and those who spend time in conditions of extreme heat. 

Wearing the MAP Health Watch can help detect dehydration. This is something completely new, an innovation on a global scale.

Our own research has shown that certain changes to the pulse can establish with high probability that the user is suffering from dehydration.

Dehydration, which may seem banal but is in fact life-threatening, has been found to be responsible for the poor health of elderly people on countless occasions. Older people are more exposed to the dangers of dehydration as the sensitivity of the brain to thirst is significantly reduced as people get older.

 

USE CASES

 

Measure and predict

By taking vital measurements of your body and analyzing the resulting data, the MAP Health Watcher system can help detect the early signs of serious health issues, including numerous heart conditions and certain types of stroke, allowing you to take preventative or remedial action.

 

React to emergencies

Because the MAP Health Watch device is equipped with an accelerometer and clinical-grade medical sensors, it can detect if your loved one should suffer a fall or accident, and even a heart attack.

If the readings report anything abnormal, the MAP Health Watcher team of qualified doctors will instantly notify relatives or close friends, as well as the relevant emergency services*. The device is also equipped with a panic button to allow users to issue a manual alert.

*If available in your region.

 

Monitor health and fitness

We all want to lead a healthier lifestyle, but how do we know if we are making progress towards our goals? The MAP Health Watch monitors stress levels, recovery time after exercise and steps taken so you can track your health and fitness in the long term, assessing your stress levels and any improvements you have made so you can stay informed and stay motivated!

 

WHAT THE EXPERTS SAY

While traditional health care has always been focused on treatment rather than cure, that is about to change with the advent of artificial intelligence. This revolution is being led by a variety of enterprises and projects, such as MAP Health Watcher, says Japanese professor and intelligence systems experts Dr. Hamido Fujita.

About MAP

 

About Artificial Intelligence

 

 

Dr. Hamido Fujita

Editor in Chief, Applied Intelligence Journal / VP of International Society of Applied Intelligence

 
 
 

Alexandra Pinter  MD, PhD

Medical Advisor, Semmelweis University

 

 

Janos Lazanyi

Chief Hardware Officer

 

TECHNICAL SPECIFICATIONS

 

 

  • Steel casing
  • 1.2 inch AMOLED display
  • Shock-proof sapphire crystal glass
  • Water resistance (IP66)
  • Panic button
  • Training mode
  • Time and date
  • Vibration motor
  • At least 24 hours of continuous use
  • Thickness: 11.5 mm

 

 

SCREENS

 

COLORS

The watch will be available with 4 different colors for the case and 2 colors for the straps. Before we ship the watch(es) for you, we will ask you to select your preferred color. 

Case colors: rose, gold, grey, black

Strap colors: white, black

 

 

PROTOTYPE

 

 

 

 

 

TIMELINE

 

 

 

MESSAGE FROM THE FOUNDERS

We are an ambitious group of medical professionals, mathematicians, and developers who have spent years forging scientifically grounded algorithms to analyze real-time health data in order to spot the very earliest signs of illnesses.

This service was the reason we created MAP Health Watch.

Our early thinking was that existing smartwatches would be the perfect way to collect this data - but we soon recognized it wasn’t going to be that simple.

The sensors used on conventional smartwatches and fitness watches simply aren’t complex or accurate enough to allow us to collect the quality of data we need.

We realized we’d have to develop our own device with clinical-grade sensors that are reliable enough to provide accurate medical data.

And that’s what we’ve spent the last three years doing.

 

SHIPPING

The estimated shipping date for the MAP Health Watch packs is December 2017. Production will begin in November, so we expect to be able to deliver the product by Christmas.

QUESTION?

If you didn't find the information you were looking for on this page, please leave a comment and we'll respond to you within 12 hours.

 

The MAP Health Watcher Team

story:
Facebook   l   Twitter  l   Instagram

The feedback we received so far from our Chinese customers is wonderful.

Here are a few examples:

"First of all, the packaging and texture are super good. The effect is remarkable! Really! It was loose when I first started using it, and it gradually became tight"

"Used it 3 times and the effect is apparent. After giving birth to a child I lost my sexual desire and felt dryness. After using Tightra things had definitely changed for the better! I am very satisfied"

"Thank you from the bottom of my heart for bringing us such a good device, which can be used for life, without having to go to the hospital for undergoing more extensive procedures"

 

Clinical Study

Tightra was clinically tested on 27 women. The clinical procedure included 8 treatment sessions twice a week, over a period of 4 weeks. Treatments were performed on the internal vagina and external labia, corresponding to 2 treatment zones according to the device instructions. Each zone was treated for 20 minutes.

At the end of the 4-week treatment period the study included a 4-weeks follow-up phase. During the follow-up phase subjects performed maintenance treatments according to their individual needs.

The study was performed by proDERM institute, a certified clinical center located in Hamburg, Germany. The study was conducted according to Good Clinical Practice (GCP) guidelines as required by the regulatory authorities.

This is a short summary of the study's results:

Sexual Functioning

 

SUI Symptoms

 

Vaginal Laxity and Vaginal Symptoms

 

Conclusion

This study indicates that Silk’n Tightra provides a safe and effective in-home treatment for the reduction of sexual distress and vaginal and SUI symptoms. There were additional improvements in vaginal tightness, labia appearance, and sexual satisfaction. Together the results show an overall improvement in the quality of life for women with these symptoms.

 

 

 

  • We are in the process of submitting Tightra to the FDA and Health Canada. Until it is cleared for shipping to the USA or Canada, we are not accepting orders from these countries. 
  • Shipping charge covers one shipping attempt to the backer’s address. A backer will be charged for a second delivery if a second shipping attempt will be needed (i.e. unclaimed/refused/returned packages).
  • Tax may apply according to your country’s custom's laws.

story:
FAQ:

What is MASS CAST? 
The first competitive social media app that ranks a user’s personal weightlifting records against users around the world.

Who is the App Developer?
Up2Code - NYC

Why should we use it?
Users are rewarded daily for their hard work and commitment to the app and personal fitness. Mass Cast is meant to benefit your personal, social, and physical weightlifting goals.

How much does it cost? 
Free! Certain competitions require "buy ins" to win big prizes. 

What kind of prizes can you win?
Not only will you win Mass Cast Apparel, but you can win supplements, protein powder, and weightlifting gear from our sponsors along with cash prizes. 

Will there be contest for certain age groups?
YES! There will be an array of different contest for you to enter. Ex: Strongest In Age Group, Male Competitions, Female Competitions, Heaviest weight and Most reps. ETC. 

Why are you crowdfunding?
We're crowdfunding to finance development of the app.

Where is all of the money being allocated to? 
All of the funds will be used to fund the development of the Mass Cast App for both IOS and Android

What are Cast Coins?
Our in-app currency that is gained by posting videos and hitting achievements. These coins can be used buy into sponsored tournaments (Buy In ranging from 100 to 1000 coins) as well as purchase MC merchandise! Cast Coins will also be available for purchase in our In-App Store

Am I guaranteed a prize if I enter a sponsored tournament? 
YES! Even if you do not place top 3, you will still win a MASSive discount towards all MC Gear and the hosting Supplement/Gear Company’s website!

Who should I contact for press?
Please email us here: masscastapp@gmail.com

Tech Specs

What is the uniqueness of the technology?
The innovative ranking system allows users to compete against others with no bias of height, weight, and gender. 

How does it work?
Simple. Lift. Upload. & Compete. 

Will there be updates to it in the future?
Yes, we'll keep it current with the latest updates to iOS and Android, and continually add new workouts, competitions to better the user experience. 

Challenges

One of our challenges is successfully funding the development of our application. After two years of design, testing and establishing a customer base and a support structure it is time to take the final step of development. 

Can't Contribute? No Problem! You can still help us!

  • Spread the word about MASS CAST. Share our Campaign! 
  • Follow us on social media! Instagram & Facebook
  • Compete in our Social Media Competitions. Build the hype and win!

story:
Stacey is aged just 24, she attended A&E in July; with a sudden head ache after a quick CT scan it showed a small benign cyst, within the foramen of Monroe , Also low laying cellaber tonsils to add to the conclusion. This type of cyst can be FATAL if left untreated causing  increased pressure in the brain, any obstruction to the csf fluid can and had in very rare cases caused sudden death, research admits. 

After out patient MRI investigations on 28/11/2015 Stacey was admitted to ward 64 and had  brain surgery to fit an ICP MONITOR to record the pressure in the ventricular region for 48hours thankfully an emergency cyst removal open brain surgery operation was not required and the cyst will be removed in a  2nd planned admission in weeks to come after Neurophysiological assessments for memory tests have been carried out for a before picture of the situation 

 This campaign has been started to try and easy the financial pressures of being in hospital and going through major brain surgery, possibly helping the recovery process.

Stacey was self employed, their was no "sick pay" entitlement from her employer
Please give generously!


THANKS TO EVERYONE WHO SUPPORTED THIS CAMPAIGN 

02/12/15 Stacey finds out the next step.
story_txt: Stacey is aged just 24, she attended A&E in July; with a sudden head ache after a quick CT scan it showed a small benign cyst, within the foramen of Monroe , Also low laying cellaber tonsils to add to the conclusion. This type of cyst can be FATAL if left untreated causing  increased pressure in the brain, any obstruction to the csf fluid can and had in very rare cases caused sudden death, research admits. After out patient MRI investigations on 28/11/2015 Stacey was admitted to ward 64 and had  brain surgery to fit an ICP MONITOR to record the pressure in the ventricular region for 48hours thankfully an emergency cyst removal open brain surgery operation was not required and the cyst will be removed in a  2nd planned admission in weeks to come after Neurophysiological assessments for memory tests have been carried out for a before picture of the situation  This campaign has been started to try and easy the financial pressures of being in hospital and going through major brain surgery, possibly helping the recovery process.Stacey was self employed, their was no "sick pay" entitlement from her employerPlease give generously!THANKS TO EVERYONE WHO SUPPORTED THIS CAMPAIGN 02/12/15 Stacey finds out the next step.

story:
Hi!  Thanks for coming here.  We invite you to make a completely tax-deductible contribution to our campaign!

WHY:   If you help us reach our goal we can help thousands of people, maybe even tens of thousands, learn how to heal themselves of things like anxiety, insomnia, depression, fatigue, low energy levels, lack of purpose, and much more by teaching them a FREE MEDICINE ~~ their own optimized healthy breaths.

(READ BELOW IF YOU WANT TO FIND OUT WHY BREATH MAY BE OUR MOST POWERFUL MEDICINE)

WHAT:  There are TEN people who are committed to teaching healthy  breathing practices to:  children,teachers in schools, children and adults facing physical and emotional challenges, prisoners, inner city youth, people in hospitals, adults trying to live a wholesome life....really everyone!

WHERE:  We need to send these ten people to a five day conference  from August 24th-29th where they are immersed in learning a spectrum of breathing practices - from simple relaxation/stress reduction techniques, to techniques that create emotional and neural regulation, to techniques that foster well-being and purpose.

These ten people will be trained by 17 experts from 4 continents in the science and best techniques of breathing practices.  Click here to see the training they will receive.  http://www.eomega.org/workshops/breath-immersion

THINK ABOUT IT!  BY TRAINING THESE TEN PEOPLE WHO ARE COMMITTED TO BRINGING THIS FREE EASY MEDICINE TO PEOPLE, WE CAN:

* HELP ALLEVIATE PHYSICAL AND EMOTIONAL SUFFERING IN THOUSANDS OF PEOPLE

*HELP THOSE THOUSANDS HAVE MORE ENERGY FOR LIFE AND GIVING TO OTHERS

*SOME OF THEM MIGHT DECIDE TO TRAIN AND TEACH BREATHING TOO!  THE RIPPLE AFFECT COULD EVENTUALLY TOUCH COUNTLESS PEOPLE

Some quotes from our scholarship applicants:

"If I am awarded a scholarship to attend the Breath Immersion Conference I will use my education to reach as many as possible. I will reach out to schools, special needs educators, prison family council leaders, members of our elderly community. I do not want to just heal individuals, I want to coordinate efforts with leaders to expand healing as far as possible. I have experienced the power of breath, I have the conviction and determination. This conference will provide me with the tools necessary to succeed."                                        --Sharon

“As an apprenticing breathworker, I seek to learn, explore and practice this sacred technique as much as possible. The Omega breath immersion offers the opportunity to bring my practice to a deeper level by enhancing cognitive understanding and practical application, with the aim of increasing my skillfulness and attunement with those in need of the healing potential of the breath. Given the powerful nature of this work, I hope to attend the conference at Omega in order to learn and practice In order to expand my capacity to allow the breaths process to unfold to it's maximum potential.”               --John



“Going to the Omega Breathwork Conference will be a gift of a lifetime! In my work it will bring about profound clarity and will bring me closer to making this work available to others and bring growth to others. My dedication to this work is steadfast, alive and I want to share this with all those seeking love & service.”                                                                                               --Megan

We all share something in common ~ the first and last thing we do in this life is take a breath!  The implications of that are being studied with greater frequency in the 21st century by medical science and research.  We can now say that there is a spectrum of breathing practices, from simple to complex, and can validate that they reliably promote a range of states such as relaxation, anxiety reduction, emotional wellness, physical wellness, neural regulation, life and brain enhancement, and even unlocking the deepest potentials in a person.  There is increasing research that is showing that the origin of much illness is lack of oxygenation of tissue. 

Learning to breathe in optimal and skillful ways could be our most powerful medicine.  Once people learn how to do it is a completely free medicine that can be accessed in any moment by every person on the planet. 

Your donation will be completely tax-deductible!  This project is being sponsored by:

Inspiration Community and Consciousness School www.inspirationcommunity.org

Global Professional Breathwork Alliance www.breathworkalliance.com

Finally, think about joining us for the conference yourself.  It is an end of the summer retreat and immersion into health, personal growth and service in a beautiful setting with an international community.

THANK YOU FOR YOUR SUPPORT!

story:
Why give? 

Let me start this off by saying a potato salad raised $60,000 on Kickstarter. A potato....salad. 

I started this campaign in honour of my 22nd birthday, in lieu of gifts or money. I've been following the conflict and the health and social services-related situation in Gaza. It is 100% clear that they need our help. Situations such as that depicted in the photo above are shocking and saddening. 

This is not about politics but about compassion and the value of human life.

I thought it would be more effective if I created a campaign to bring together the interests of people wanting to get involved or help in some form under one umbrella. 

Where will it go?

The UNRWA. Details:
http://www.unrwa.org/donate?amount=800
Skeptical? Read this:
http://www.thedailybeast.com/articles/2014/07/26/inside-the-gaza-schoolyard-massacre.html

How much? 

Anything. We take for granted shelter, safety and comfort. Some people don't have the same luxury. Anything helps! 

    Want to learn more? 

    Check out the video attached to this campaign, and educate yourself (but make sure to fact-check your sources).

story:
1, Chronic Diseases Data (The urgent need for Supreme Greens Meal replacement)

     

This data reveals a nation filled with chronic diseases and a systematic failure to deliver quality foods intended to keep us healthy. Supreme Greens Energy Igniter is specifically designed to provide a convenient, whole-food nutrition that promotes inner healing to combat these issues and maintain a healthy lifestyle.

2, Supreme Greens Organic Certification.

Having passed the rigorous USDA organic certification process, the Supreme Greens formula guarantees the quality and purity of the organic ingredients inside. The USDA ORGANIC logo displayed on every box ensures the preservation of source energy within the DNA structure of the individual ingredients which separates this product from the non-organic supplements on the market.

            

3,  Supreme Greens Product information

Each packet contains a special blend of organic ingredients, utilizing the Yin-Yang energy balance theory to provide a natural boost of Yang energy into your immune system. That is how Supreme Greens ignites your inner healing power and works to eliminate chronic diseases without harmful side-effects.

           The full list of benefits from the Supreme Greens’ nutrients and vitamins are detailed in the form below:

 

   

                                                                                           

 

   

 

Additional health benefits:

Supreme Greens properly adjusts your pH balance from acidity base to alkaloid base so chronic illnesses can be cured permanently.

Supreme Greens provides an extra boost of energy during exercise and works to metabolize your cells so you maintain your focus and energy as you build muscle.

Supreme Greens assists in balancing high blood pressure, high cholesterol, high glucose, cleansing your blood vessels and strengthening your heart muscles and overall functions.

 

4, Supreme Greens Directions for use:

Each box contains 30 packets which are easy to carry and quick to use.

Just pour a packet into warm water, your favorite juice, smoothie or add it to soup.

Whether you are at home, school or on a business trip where whole food nutrition is hard to find, one small packet of Supreme Greens is the meal replacement for you.

Here are a list of suggestions for making Supreme Greens a part of your daily routine:

                                                                                            

1)  Go Green Juice                         

Juice 2 stalks of celery,

Juice 2 apples,

Juice bunch of kale stems

Thumb size of ginger

Thumbs size of lemon

Add 1 table spoon supreme green powders 

 

2)  Mongo Smoothie                                  

1 banana

one 1/4 cup mango cuts

Small handful of Kale stems

Small handful of fresh mint

1 tea spoon of Supreme Greens powder

1 full cup of soy or almond milk

Blend all together in food blender.                       

 

3) Strawberry Kiwi Breeze                          

2/3 of ice

One 1/4 cup of concentrate kiwi juice

One 1/4 cup of concentrate strawberry juice

2 table spoons of lemon syrup

1 1/8 tea spoon of Supreme Greens powder

Fill glass with water

Add 2 table spoons of soda water.

 

4)  Green Island Breeze                              

2/3 of ice

Fresh pineapple juice to the 4/5 glass

1 1/8 tea spoon of Supreme Greens powder

Fill glass with soda water

Add pineapple cut and lemon slices. 

 

5,  Results and benefits from Supreme Greens:

 

  

     Before Vegetarian                   Before Supreme Greens            After Supreme Greens                                                         

                           

 

                              

6, Testimonials

       

    Dr. Jeng K. Kuan, DC, LAc, Dipl. OM

As a practitioner, I am selective when it comes to quality of food, especially when I have to suggest any herb or supplement to my patients for bettering their health. LH Organic USA’s Supreme Greens has organic ingredients coming with required nutrients for normal body functions. I have personally used their Supreme Greens and also suggested the product to my patients when the patient needs a boost in either their immune system or general health. I highly recommend it.

In TCM food therapy, if one follows the natural rhythm and eats properly based on the season, then the body will get healthy even having a poor constitution. Many chronic conditions will also fade away and get healed naturally when abiding the wisdom of food therapy. Supreme Greens apply the wisdom of food therapy

Prosperity Health Center

Acupuncture, Chiropractic, Massage, Herbal Care

 

 

Dr. Sandoval is a world-recognized expert an in-demand lecturer and radio talk show personality, as well as an entrepreneur, nutritionist, activist, personality, author, and one of the leading authorities on whole food nutrition and disease prevention.

Because of his passion for helping people recognize the relationship between diet and health, David Sandoval Co founded and is the CEO of Purium Health Products. Believing that there is most definitely a relationship between diet and disease, Sandoval has dedicated himself to providing real solutions for reclaiming health through nutritious, real, whole foods, organically grown.

      

 

Hollywood movie actor and film producer Lawrence  Smileys’ testimony after use our Supreme Greens

“Recently I was introduced to a product called “Supreme Greens.” After consuming this product every day for the past month I have found it to be an excellent source of chlorophyll and other essential minerals. I try to juice often, but this can be very time-consuming. Since I lead a very active lifestyle and am very busy in all my pursuits, time is an important commodity. Supreme Greens is an excellent supplement for active people and is a great way to get your daily greens quick and easy. I also found the product to be an excellent appetite suppressant, and even though I don't have to watch my weight there are times when healthy food is not readily available or you just need to hold off till dinner or lunch. Supreme Greens comes in small individualized packets and it's easy to have the product readily available. I always keep a few packets in my car’s glove box and travel bag for those hunger emergencies. Lastly I would like to say that Supreme Greens also has a detoxifying effect that can help regulate any type of constipation problems, but also provide one with increased energy and mental cognizance.

I would highly recommend this product to anybody whether they are healthy or unhealthy. However, if you're looking for ways to detoxify your intestinal system, which is well known to be the cornerstone of health, Supreme Greens is a quick and easy way to start.

Lawrence Smiley, Movie Producer and actor

 

Hollywood Movie Director David Llauger  Meiselman’s testimony after using Supreme Greens:

“Supreme Greens?, It really helped to suppress the hunger  and boost my energy, I take it every day through the day. I’m hooked, need more… before I run out!!!!”

David Llauger Meiselman

 

Show host Merilee’s testimony

“I like Supreme Greens. I take it with me anywhere; it gives me energy and keep me fit.  I love the organic nutrients it carries, plenty of super food”.

Merrilee Klein Sweeney

 

Glenn Ratcliffe’s Testimony

 “After taken Supreme Greens, it immediately raised my energy level, my body seems more balanced. Before I took supreme Greens, my weight was 204 pounds, after 20 days taken Supreme Greens, I am 197 pound now. I don’t each too much anymore, lost some appetize, but my energy is much higher than before, I definite recommend Supreme Greens to everyone”.

Glenn Ratcliffe, Movie Actor

 

Jason, Crystal stone expert

In life it's all about energy frequency and vibration. Therefore to truly be healthy is to be at the right vibration. Most other herbal powders that I have taken only offer some of the essential vitamins. This is the first green herbal powder that I've ever taken. I feel a rush of long lasting energy flowing through my body and I feel my vibration changing and helping not only feed my body the essential nutrients but also tuning me to the right frequency creating a better vibration. All done without that chalky taste that most other brands have. Plus completely organic ingredients. Now that's special!. Also helped one of my friends get over the flu too! Highly recommended!

Jason, Crystal Stone expert

 

7, The story of Supreme Greens creation from Founder

My passion for helping people live healthier lives comes from a grounded upbringing in China and a cultural awakening here in America. My childhood in China was spent on land that had yet to be chemically modified. When I think back on the meals my family prepared, I remember all-natural, wholesome foods that tasted great and satisfied my hunger. We never questioned the nourishment we were getting because there was no reason to fear the foods we ate, it was all grown naturally. At that time, our society was not plagued with problems like obesity, high blood pressure and we never even heard of cancer.

After arriving in the United States, I was suddenly faced with a different food reality; high fat, high sugar, high cholesterol and fast foods. As I grew accustomed to eating this way, I went from 130 to 200 pounds in less than a year. My health declined as I took advantage of low priced food and weekly deals on grocery store foods labeled ‘natural.’ Although I could feel my body rejecting the textures and tastes of the cheaper foods, it was’t until I had trouble with simple walks down the street that I knew I was in trouble.

My family had an even bigger wake-up call when my son developed sinus and ear infections. After a series of clinic and hospital visits, and hundreds of needle shots later, we discovered he had a serious intolerance to dairy foods. Time and time again, a new medical concoction was prescribed but did not cure him. It was not until my family adopted a totally organic, plant-based diet, that my son’s symptoms receded and in just a few months, completely disappeared. In fact, this profound shift in our eating improved all of our health. Within three months I shed upwards of 40 pounds and could walk freely. The children’s energy levels were noticeably higher and as the seasons changed, I felt no signs of the colds and flu that my friends and employees were experiencing.

As I continued to research common food practices, I discovered that fast foods and even ‘natural foods’ found in the grocery store, that were conveniently meant to save money and time were not at all natural. They are what we refer to as Genetically Modified Organisms or GMO foods, which could not satisfy hunger due to lack of real nutrients or energy.  Over the years, continual consumption of these foods has wreaked havoc on family, friends and acquaintances with ‘normal’ eating habits. I have painfully watched people I love succumb to the ailments, sickness and disease that are common for people my age. These experiences have reinforced my belief that organic, plant-based foods are the best medicine for a long healthy life. They are the only way to deliver nutrients with 100% potency and the highest frequency of source energy.

1) Yin and Yang Energy.

With a newfound respect for the positive impact of organic plant-based food in my life, I became a natural Qi-Gong practitioner. My goal was to understand the link between organic nutrition and spiritual wellbeing by comparing ancient wisdom with modern Asian and Western medicines.  My studies have shown that the most beneficial way of life for all living things is based on a well-known but misunderstood “Yin and Yang” energy balance theory. The concepts are intellectually understood by many but difficult to put into practice when comes to food and nutrition.

In the simplest terms, Yang energy is from the sun’s light. It is the ‘source energy’ that created our universe and fosters growth and healing in all living things. Yang energy is warm, light, creative, and up-lifting.  Yin energy is the polar opposite and stems from darkness. It’s a shadow force that is cold, heavy and destructive, which makes people prone to sickness and death. While they may seem independent of each other, these two energies are resolutely connected. 

In fact, Chinese medicine, throughout history, has formulated its remedies based on the Yin and Yang energy balance theory and in accordance with the five elements of movement law. This means patients have been treated for generations based on their Yin or Yang deficiencies. This perspective has shaped my view of the modern world.

The cultural acceptance of western medicine, unnatural foods, slaughtering of animals, invasive technology and social disconnection has created an overabundance of Yin energy that must be counteracted. If we can access more Yang energy, then the cells in our bodies can regenerate quickly and revitalize our immune systems. This means we can live longer, happier and more productive lives. However, only organically grown foods contain the balanced Yin-Yang energy with nature’s DNA inside; GMO foods do not. That is why Supreme Greens is so special.

With a variety of ‘organic’ food supplement choices on the market, Supreme Greens is the only organic plant-based supplement that is designed to boost your Yang energy and keep the Yin and Yang in balance. After 15 years of experience in the health and supplements field and a sincere dedication to organic plant-based living, the most effective way to put this Ancient wisdom into practice and prevent modern chronic diseases that I have worked on is the Supreme Greens formula. The ingredients are structured in the correct ratio to bring out the best coherent integration functions, according to the five element movement law. This releases your inner healing power and produces maximum effectiveness. This takes your health back quickly and easily and is free of the absurd costs and side effects that come other products on the market.

2)  The misleading truth about ‘natural’ standardized extracts.

When comparing ‘natural’ supplements to truly organic whole-food supplements, you must understand the truth about standardized extracts.

Standardized extracts actually change the plant’s original DNA structure. It is a low grade method to find the individual chemical compound and extract that single compound out of the whole plant.  This process actually destroys the natural functions and benefits of that ingredient. Yes, it can strengthen one single factor or compound to make its effects more powerful in the short term; but like most western medicines, the benefits are temporary and it delivers long lasting side effects that are harmful to the consumer.

The reason is simple; single standardized extracts do not have the complete DNA code and nutrients to support long lasting benefits. Complete nutrients with the DNA code intact, work to restore your immune system and heal the root causes of illness and not just the symptoms.

Supreme Greens does not utilized standardized extracts because we believe illnesses can be stopped quickly with good whole-food nutrition. Our mission is to provide the best organic whole-food nutrition and push future generations to be healthy, respect mother nature and protect animal life around the world.

 

8,  Rewards for supporting the SUPREME GREENS ENERGY IGNITER

                  1)      You will improve your health and ensure a better quality of life.

 

                  

 

     2）Our earth nature will be back to sustainable and Greener world for our next generations。

 

                  

 

 3)      Nature, human and animals now can live together peacefully in prosperity and happiness.

 

                

 

 

 4), There is an Associate VIP Membership Rewards Program which could allow you to benefit financially. Contact us for details.

I always keep a few packets in my car’s glove box and travel bag for those hunger emergencies. Lastly I would like to say that Supreme Greens also has a detoxifying effect that can help regulate any type of constipation problems, but also provide one with increased energy and mental cognizance.I would highly recommend this product to anybody whether they are healthy or unhealthy. However, if you're looking for ways to detoxify your intestinal system, which is well known to be the cornerstone of health, Supreme Greens is a quick and easy way to start.Lawrence Smiley, Movie Producer and actor Hollywood Movie Director David Llauger  Meiselman’s testimony after using Supreme Greens:“Supreme Greens?, It really helped to suppress the hunger  and boost my energy, I take it every day through the day. I’m hooked, need more… before I run out!!!!”David Llauger Meiselman Show host Merilee’s testimony“I like Supreme Greens. I take it with me anywhere; it gives me energy and keep me fit.  I love the organic nutrients it carries, plenty of super food”.Merrilee Klein Sweeney Glenn Ratcliffe’s Testimony “After taken Supreme Greens, it immediately raised my energy level, my body seems more balanced. Before I took supreme Greens, my weight was 204 pounds, after 20 days taken Supreme Greens, I am 197 pound now. I don’t each too much anymore, lost some appetize, but my energy is much higher than before, I definite recommend Supreme Greens to everyone”.Glenn Ratcliffe, Movie Actor Jason, Crystal stone expertIn life it's all about energy frequency and vibration. Therefore to truly be healthy is to be at the right vibration. Most other herbal powders that I have taken only offer some of the essential vitamins. This is the first green herbal powder that I've ever taken. I feel a rush of long lasting energy flowing through my body and I feel my vibration changing and helping not only feed my body the essential nutrients but also tuning me to the right frequency creating a better vibration. All done without that chalky taste that most other brands have. Plus completely organic ingredients. Now that's special!. Also helped one of my friends get over the flu too! Highly recommended!Jason, Crystal Stone expert 7, The story of Supreme Greens creation from FounderMy passion for helping people live healthier lives comes from a grounded upbringing in China and a cultural awakening here in America. My childhood in China was spent on land that had yet to be chemically modified. When I think back on the meals my family prepared, I remember all-natural, wholesome foods that tasted great and satisfied my hunger. We never questioned the nourishment we were getting because there was no reason to fear the foods we ate, it was all grown naturally. At that time, our society was not plagued with problems like obesity, high blood pressure and we never even heard of cancer.After arriving in the United States, I was suddenly faced with a different food reality; high fat, high sugar, high cholesterol and fast foods. As I grew accustomed to eating this way, I went from 130 to 200 pounds in less than a year. My health declined as I took advantage of low priced food and weekly deals on grocery store foods labeled ‘natural.’ Although I could feel my body rejecting the textures and tastes of the cheaper foods, it was’t until I had trouble with simple walks down the street that I knew I was in trouble.My family had an even bigger wake-up call when my son developed sinus and ear infections. After a series of clinic and hospital visits, and hundreds of needle shots later, we discovered he had a serious intolerance to dairy foods. Time and time again, a new medical concoction was prescribed but did not cure him. It was not until my family adopted a totally organic, plant-based diet, that my son’s symptoms receded and in just a few months, completely disappeared. In fact, this profound shift in our eating improved all of our health. Within three months I shed upwards of 40 pounds and could walk freely. The children’s energy levels were noticeably higher and as the seasons changed, I felt no signs of the colds and flu that my friends and employees were experiencing.As I continued to research common food practices, I discovered that fast foods and even ‘natural foods’ found in the grocery store, that were conveniently meant to save money and time were not at all natural. They are what we refer to as Genetically Modified Organisms or GMO foods, which could not satisfy hunger due to lack of real nutrients or energy.  Over the years, continual consumption of these foods has wreaked havoc on family, friends and acquaintances with ‘normal’ eating habits. I have painfully watched people I love succumb to the ailments, sickness and disease that are common for people my age. These experiences have reinforced my belief that organic, plant-based foods are the best medicine for a long healthy life. They are the only way to deliver nutrients with 100% potency and the highest frequency of source energy.1) Yin and Yang Energy.With a newfound respect for the positive impact of organic plant-based food in my life, I became a natural Qi-Gong practitioner. My goal was to understand the link between organic nutrition and spiritual wellbeing by comparing ancient wisdom with modern Asian and Western medicines.  My studies have shown that the most beneficial way of life for all living things is based on a well-known but misunderstood “Yin and Yang” energy balance theory. The concepts are intellectually understood by many but difficult to put into practice when comes to food and nutrition.In the simplest terms, Yang energy is from the sun’s light. It is the ‘source energy’ that created our universe and fosters growth and healing in all living things. Yang energy is warm, light, creative, and up-lifting.  Yin energy is the polar opposite and stems from darkness. It’s a shadow force that is cold, heavy and destructive, which makes people prone to sickness and death. While they may seem independent of each other, these two energies are resolutely connected. In fact, Chinese medicine, throughout history, has formulated its remedies based on the Yin and Yang energy balance theory and in accordance with the five elements of movement law. This means patients have been treated for generations based on their Yin or Yang deficiencies. This perspective has shaped my view of the modern world.The cultural acceptance of western medicine, unnatural foods, slaughtering of animals, invasive technology and social disconnection has created an overabundance of Yin energy that must be counteracted. If we can access more Yang energy, then the cells in our bodies can regenerate quickly and revitalize our immune systems. This means we can live longer, happier and more productive lives. However, only organically grown foods contain the balanced Yin-Yang energy with nature’s DNA inside; GMO foods do not. That is why Supreme Greens is so special.With a variety of ‘organic’ food supplement choices on the market, Supreme Greens is the only organic plant-based supplement that is designed to boost your Yang energy and keep the Yin and Yang in balance. After 15 years of experience in the health and supplements field and a sincere dedication to organic plant-based living, the most effective way to put this Ancient wisdom into practice and prevent modern chronic diseases that I have worked on is the Supreme Greens formula. The ingredients are structured in the correct ratio to bring out the best coherent integration functions, according to the five element movement law. This releases your inner healing power and produces maximum effectiveness. This takes your health back quickly and easily and is free of the absurd costs and side effects that come other products on the market.2)  The misleading truth about ‘natural’ standardized extracts. When comparing ‘natural’ supplements to truly organic whole-food supplements, you must understand the truth about standardized extracts.Standardized extracts actually change the plant’s original DNA structure. It is a low grade method to find the individual chemical compound and extract that single compound out of the whole plant.  This process actually destroys the natural functions and benefits of that ingredient. Yes, it can strengthen one single factor or compound to make its effects more powerful in the short term; but like most western medicines, the benefits are temporary and it delivers long lasting side effects that are harmful to the consumer.The reason is simple; single standardized extracts do not have the complete DNA code and nutrients to support long lasting benefits. Complete nutrients with the DNA code intact, work to restore your immune system and heal the root causes of illness and not just the symptoms.Supreme Greens does not utilized standardized extracts because we believe illnesses can be stopped quickly with good whole-food nutrition. Our mission is to provide the best organic whole-food nutrition and push future generations to be healthy, respect mother nature and protect animal life around the world. 8,  Rewards for supporting the SUPREME GREENS ENERGY IGNITER                  1)      You will improve your health and ensure a better quality of life.                         2）Our earth nature will be back to sustainable and Greener world for our next generations。                     3)      Nature, human and animals now can live together peacefully in prosperity and happiness.                    4), There is an Associate VIP Membership Rewards Program which could allow you to benefit financially. Contact us for details.

story:
Inspired by Children - Designed For Everybody

 

 

As featured in:

 

 

Do you live in a polluted city? Do you commute by bike or underground? Are you planning a family trip to India, China, or South East Asia?

Then Freka Go is for you. Freka Go is facewear that protects you and your loved ones from air-pollution, so you can go outside without any worries.

                   

 

Freka Go is a must-have facewear for those who will not let pollution trap them indoors. 

You don’t need those heavy duty respirators! Unlike regular pollution masks, Freka Go is specially adapted to the needs of adults and children who live in polluted cities. It balances high functionality with comfort and style. Ready to go: anywhere, anytime.

 

 

Freka Go’s ergonomic design is inspired by children.

 

 

Kids are our toughest critics, our biggest teachers.

Children are natural-born critics, intuitive, unstoppable bundles of energy, and are also the most vulnerable to discomfort and pollution. They are the key to a well- balanced design, which is exactly why we have looked to them as inspiration for our Freka Go.

 

Honey! Don’t shrink the product for kids! 

We are not shrinking a product designed for adults. Freka Go is created based on the physiology and intuitive behavioural patterns of children where we have taken children as the benchmark for ergonomic design.

 

 

Resolving the dilemma of existing pollution masks.

 

Style and Breathability

 

 

Comfort and Air-tight Sealing

 

 

Replaceability and Effective Filtration

 

 

Product Features 

 
 
 

 

 

 

 

 

What is innovation without a challenge?

 

Every challenge along the way is a lesson on how to make our facewear design the best it can be. So what are our biggest challenges?

 

Understanding children aged 7-12: We have been intensively studying every aspect of children’s physiological features across ethnicities, and behavioural patterns to design the most intuitive and attractive facewear. 

 

Designing a testing standard equivalent for children: As there are no international certification standards for children’s masks, we are working closely with a renowned 3rd party certification agency to adapt the adult mask testing standards into our own comparable testing standard for children. 

 

 

Timeline

 

A balance between what children want and what parents want for their children is key to determining the perfect facewear design. Which is why we are asking for feedback from our backers. Depending on the feedback we receive we will launch either in December (if everyone is happy) or in February (if we need to fine tune our design more).

 

 

We need your help! Be a part of our journey. 

 

Be a Feedbacker!

By choosing the Feedbacker Pack you can try out our tested, non-commercial sample with your kids (7–12 years old) for before we launch our final version. Throughout one month you will be asked to fill out four short surveys about your experience. And because of your feedback we will be able to make the design even better for you and your kids.

 

Be a Backer!

So many choices to pick from, so many options! Choose a perk that suits you the best, select your size and the colour you like, and we’re ready to go.

 

Share!

Know someone who might like/need Freka? Like our design concept and strategy? If you’ve got friends or family travelling, commuting, and cycling- don’t keep us a secret from them! Help us by sharing about Freka Go on social media and spreading the word!

 

 

Perks

 

 

Size Guide

 

 

Colour Guide

 

About Base6

Freka Go is a facewear brand from Base6 Ltd, an ergonomic design company. Our dynamic team is comprised of (very) unique individuals from different parts of the world. We believe in believing that anything is possible. Last year we pioneered the concept of “facewear”. This year we are taking our facewear to the next level with Freka Go. 

Let’s Go!

 

Visit Us

 

 

FAQ

 

What is the Feedbacker Pack?

Our backers who choose the Feedbacker Pack will have the opportunity to try out our tested, non-commercial sample of Freka Go with their children in October before we roll out the final Freka Go facewear. Over the course of one month, Feedback Pack backers (see what we did there?) will participate in four short surveys and will play a key role in helping us make the best design for us and our children.

 

What type of feedback will you ask for?

Nobody understands your children like you do! Your feedback will determine if there is something we need to change in terms of comfort, colours, and fine-tuning. When you choose the Feedback Pack, all you have to do is to complete four short online surveys for you and your child over the course of one month. Once that’s done, we do the rest to make Freka Go the best it can be! How much could this get?!

 

Can Freka be used on children younger than 7?

It is possible, but before the age of 7, children’s respiratory systems are still delicate and underdeveloped, and any sort of facial covering or could create discomfort. Around 7 years old, children’s respiratory systems start becoming more developed and are able to easily wear masks without problems.

 

Why does the children’s facewear only have one size?

The key indicator in the size guide is the distance between the tip of the nose and the tip of the chin. Almost all kids fall within the same range for this distance, and the width of the facewear is easily adjustable using the ear-straps.  For adults, however, as there is much greater variation between the nose-chin distance, we have created two sizes to accommodate all faces.

 

Where is Freka being manufactured?

We already have our value chain in place and ready for additional sampling, mass production, and shipping. Our facewear will be manufactured in the UK and Korea, and will be shipped from Korea. We are so ready to go!

 

When will my Freka Go be shipped?

We want to give you only the best Freka experience, so the quality of our facewear is our topmost priority. Our launch date will be decided by the feedback we receive from our Feedback Pack backers during the evaluation stage. If we need to make minimal changes, we will launch Freka Go this December. If Freka Go needs a little more work according to our Feedbacker kids and adults, we will refine every necessary part and launch Freka Go early next year in February.

 

Where can I buy filters after the Indiegogo campaign is over?

Once the Indiegogo campaign is over, you will be able to purchase Freka Go’s replaceable filters on our website: www.freka.co.uk.

 

How often would I need to replace the filter?

Over time, filters become clogged with air pollutants, dust and bacteria simply by being exposed to the outside. This is why it is important to regularly replace used filters with new ones. Freka Go makes this easy with it’s replaceable filters (rather than having to replace a whole mask).  We suggest replacing Freka’s filters every 5-7 days, depending on the level of pollution.

 

Will Freka Go protect me from bacteria?

Freka Go’s filter protects from over 95% of PM2.5 micro-particles, which includes some microbes and bacteria as well.

 

Can I use Freka Go while cycling?

Yes! Freka Go can be used during light-moderate exercise. However, we would not suggest wearing Freka Go or any sort of mask during intense physical exercise unless they are specially designed for high intensity purposes. During exercise breathing patterns change drastically and require a much heavier duty respirator to effectively filter the air.

 

What is this testing standard thing you’re talking about?

A CE mark on a product shows that it has passed all the tests for safety and performance according to EU standards. Currently there are no such standards for masks for children. We are developing our own internal standard for children in partnership with one of the very best testing agencies to make sure we develop the highest quality facewear in terms of performance, functionality and safety for children’s masks.

story:
EcoQube Air is a desktop greenhouse designed to improve your quality of life. It adds healthy air, smart light therapy, thriving greenery, and beauty to any space.

The EcoQube air is the best solution for indoor gardening because it provides the perfect environment for plants to grow.

Grow food or your favorite plants in any environment, in any season. Grow your plants without direct sunlight. The full-spectrum LED light is programmed to give your plants the exact amount of light it needs to grow fastest.

See how the EcoQube Air makes it easier to grow plants in video below! 

 

 

Pour clean water in, and the dirty water flows out of the drain spout.

The air you breathe may be filled with mold, chemicals, and dangerous toxins. Indoor air pollution can lead to a wide range of health problems.

See how the EcoQube Air filters your air in video below!

Sunlight dictates your circadian rhythm, which directs our body’s biological clock and tells you when to sleep and when to be awake. With increased exposure to computer, tablet, and phone screens today, our circadian rhythms have been completely thrown off.

The smart LED light not only provides the perfect lighting for your plants, it also simulates the cycle of the sun.

You can use the EcoQube Air to influence your own biological clock with the phone app. This helps you wake up feeling refreshed, alleviates insomnia, helps overcome jet lag, improves productivity, and helps prevent seasonal depression.

Use the phone app to pre-program specific light schedules, change colors, adjust weather functions, or control your light from across the room.

See how EcoQube Air improves your circadian rhythm in video below!

There are plenty of beautiful aquariums, terrariums, and home gardens out there, but what do they DO for you? The EcoQube air combines FORM with FUNCTION to naturally improve your environment and your quality of life.

According to studies conducted by Exeter University, plant-rich environments providing clean air can boost creativity and productivity, improve your mood, reduce stress, and energize your body.

The cost of individual products adds up in money, space, and time. One Ecoqube Air solves all these needs at a fraction of the cost.

EcoQube Air is durable, compact, and portable. We use the latest technology to make gardening as easy and efficient as possible without the hassle.

We want to experience nature and have a fresh, healthy environment, but this is difficult with our current workspaces, living environments, and societal norms.

Enrich your life and improve your health by bringing nature into your home or office with the EcoQube Air.

Our mission is to improve people’s lives by designing the most beautiful, low-maintenance desktop ecosystems ever. Join our movement to educate everyone about hydroponics and aquaponics, promote sustainability, and transform our living spaces.

Let’s bring nature back into our lives and blur the lines between the outdoors and indoors.

See the story about us in video below!

 

Our names are Eric and Kevin. We're UC San Diego students and aquarium geeks who met in high school and share a passion for planted aquatic ecosystems.

We started out working at various aquarium shops in San Francisco, including Aquatic Central and Aqua Forest Aquarium. We eventually started our own online aquarium store called Aqua Design Innovations while selling shrimp out of a garage.

As we got older, we started to become more aware of the harsher realities of our world, realizing that there are many people globally who face food and water shortages every day but that for most of us, such issues are so foreign.

We couldn't ignore the facts, so we decided to use our knowledge of aquariums to find a feasible solution.

We hope to educate as many people as possible about the practical solution and beauty of aquaponics and hydroponics and to ultimately help initiate the process of bringing aquaponics to the forefront of today's agriculture.

The EcoQube Air is the next step in our evolution towards a healthier, more sustainable world.

story:
Join the waiting list at airawear.com to secure your spot in line to order your AiraWear vest or hoodie. You can also contact us at info@airawear.com for any enquiries. 

 

 

 

Ultra-thin acupressure technology analyzes & improves body posture in real-time to relieve tension. 

 

The smart solution to better posture & a healthy back.  

 

6 Inflatable Pillows, Pressure Point Relaxers & Body Compression Modules eliminate stress, analyzes & alerts of bad posture to instill healthy habits.

 

 

 

 

 

​

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

The AiraWear smartphone app has a clean, easy-to-navigate interface. Our app allows you to select the massage program of your choice based on intensity preference, duration and pain points. 

 

 

 

 

​

Using Aira's six inflatable pressure point relaxers & full body compression modules, Airawear targets muscles and pain points, to release tension caused by hours of sitting and poor posture.

 

 

 

 

 

For the right amount of relief, adjust the intensity of your massage with the  swipe of your finger. Simply slide "UP" for a intense massage or "DOWN" for a more relaxing, gentle massage.

 

 

Aira's Posture Tracking Sensors analyze your posture throughout the day. The AiraWear app tracks your posture in real-time and shows your slouching angle. When poor posture is detected, the AiraWear automatically inflates providing lower back support and correcting your posture.

 

 

The Intelligent Posture Tracking Sensors analyze your habits throughout the day helping you improve habits and eliminate daily aches and pains. 

Aira offers an iOS or Android Compatible Smartphone App with Bluetooth BLE connectivity with USB charging. Tracks 7 days of detailed posture data – minute by minute.

 

​

Thanks to its ultra-thin inflatable modules, AiraWear is barely noticeable and 100% discreet to those around you. Weighing in at 700g, it is equivalent to a normal hoodie jacket in weight and size.

 

AiraWear’s inner vest can be paired with any outerwear of your choice, making it the perfect companion for your favorite hoodie, jacket or coat.

 

 

 

AiraWear charges like your smartphone, and is fully charged in 2 hours by lithium batteries. AiraWear lasts 3 hours, enough for multiple relaxing massages in the office. 

Charge AiraWear easily by connecting the jacket to a micro USB charger -- this also means that you can easily power AiraWear using a portable charger.

 

 

 If you are unsure which size you should get, here's how AiraWear compares with some international brands! We've also made our jacket design more flexible to accomodate a wider range within each new size (e.g. our old XS and S sizes fall under the new F1 size - see below for more details):

 

All sizes are measured in inches and are applicable to both the hoodie and the vest. You can grab a measuring tape and further determine which size best suits you too (old AiraWear sizing on the left column, see above chart for new size comparisons).

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Water resistance 

AiraWear Massage Hoodie electronic is splash proof. It is advisable not to wear it as a flotation device, and not to wear it out in the rain. 

Care 

For best care: 

  • Unzip AiraWear Massage Hoodie from inner massage unit 
  • Wash outer hoodie as usual
  • Wipe inner massage unit with damp cloth

Materials 

The different components of AiraWear are crafted from the following quality materials: 

  • Wearable pump: Thermoplastic 
  • Massage modules: TPU coated Nylon fabric 
  • Vest: Cotton, Polyester fabric 
  • Hoodie: Cotton, Polyester fabric 

Battery and Power 

Usage time: 3 - 6 hours Standby time: 48 hours Battery: Lithium-Polymer 1800 mAh 3.7V Charge time: 1 - 2 hours Charging connection: micro USB cable 

Dimension of Wearable Pump 

  • Length: 75mm, 2.9 in 
  • Width: 65mm, 2.5 in 
  • Height: 30mm, 1.2 in 

Weight 

1200g, 2.6lbs 

Wireless connection 

Bluetooth Low Energy (BLE) to smartphone 

Smartphone OS Compatibility 

  • iOS 9 & above
  • Android 4.3 & above

 

FAQs

 

 

What is Aira/AiraWear?

AiraWear is the world’s first intelligent massage jacket, and the idea was conceived in the fall of 2015. Sometimes, people like to shorten the name to Aira (probably out of convenience).

 

How does AiraWear work?

AiraWear works by using specially-designed air pillows to apply pressure on your back, which produces an acupressure and kneading sensation. Our smartphone app, connected via Bluetooth, has various massage programs to relieve the muscle tensions affecting different muscle groups on the back.

 

AiraWear also has a live posture assessment system which is supported by a posture sensor on the jacket. This posture assessment system tracks and records the posture of the person, reminding them of their posture by massaging their lower back when they have poor posture.

 

How do you use AiraWear?

Check out our how-to video:

In summary:

 

1. You wear the jacket like the ones in your wardrobe.

2. Make fitting adjustments with the adjustable velcro straps that comes with the jacket. Ensure that the jacket fits you snugly for the best massage experience.

3. Switch on the jacket.

4. To start the massage, all you need to do is to connect the accompanying app to AiraWear via Bluetooth. Then select your desired program with one click.

 

What is the warranty for AiraWear?

We provide a one (1) year limited warranty. We guarantee that you will receive your AiraWear free of manufacturing defects. We conduct our quality control with the AQL inspection table in accordance to international quality standards.

 

 

What is the exchange policy for AiraWear?

Airawear has a 14 days exchange policy, you can request for an exchange after approaching customer service.

In the event that you need warranty/return service for your Airawear, please send an email to info@airawear.com to get a RETURN AUTHORIZATION (RA) number.

All returns must include the RA number on the front of the shipping box. Airawear/Tware is not responsible for items returned without obtaining an RA number prior to shipping.

 

How much does AiraWear cost?

The retail price of AiraWear massage vest is US$199. The AiraWear massage hoodie is US$249.

 

But right now, you can get AiraWear at its lowest price ever on IndieGoGo’s InDemand.Back us there!

 

Can AiraWear go past TSA security?

You can bring AiraWear past TSA security. However, you’ll have to put AiraWear through the scanning belt together with your carry-on luggage.

 

This is because AiraWear is a tech product, and the TSA treats all tech products as baggage to be scanned. To reduce the delay in going past airport security, you should not wear AiraWear through the body scanner.

 

We’ve personally tested this and brought AiraWear to Dubai, USA, Germany… Just to name a few.

 

How long does the battery last for?

If you’re an avid lover of massage, and use AiraWear continuously, AiraWear should last you about 3 hours. However, we do not recommend using AiraWear’s massage function for 3 hours straight.

If you use AiraWear occasionally, and only use it to reward yourself after a long day of work, it should last you about 1 – 2 days.

 

How do I charge AiraWear, and how long do I charge it?

AiraWear works like any smartphone. All you’ll have to do is to plug AiraWear to a power source using a micro-USB cable.

 

It takes about 2 hours to charge AiraWear from flat. You can use AiraWear while it is charging. The battery life is reflected in the app.

 

If used non-stop, the AiraWear jacket lasts for 3 hours straight.

 

What is AiraWear made of?

We select the best materials in order to give you the most enjoyable massage experience. AiraWear massage modules comprises of high-tech composite materials such as TPU-coated Nylon fabric that is flexible enough to be worn comfortably on the body, but sturdy enough to knead your muscle.

 

How do I maintain AiraWear? Do I wash it?

Yes, AiraWear is washable. All you have to do is to separate the inner massage vest from the outer jacket layer by unzipping them. Remove the electronics compartment from the inner massage vest and it can be wiped down using a damp cloth.

 

The hoodie can be machine-washed. AiraWear is splashproof, but not the inner massage vest is not waterproof, so we do not recommend you wear AiraWear in rainy weather.

 

How do I contact AiraWear?

You can reach us at info@airawear.com

story:
" Hey!

 

So nor I or my two friends here are experts in marketing so I will try my best to keep you entertained next to everyone else's super cool projects, and hopefully maybe make you see the light in the project we love so much and would like for everyone in the world to have the opportunity to feel just as peaceful as we do! So! Our team consists of three: my two girl friends, let's call them the Model and Yogi and I, the one who does all the work. All three are descendants from the sea! We value and take our health and exercise quite seriously and (in the most demanding form possible) work full time so sometimes, just sometimes, :p we enjoy our trips to Ibiza or Burning Man where we seem to have a hard time leaving and tend to afterwards bring the new wave of thought and this new contemporary hippie to the big city and then of course get disappointed because it is just so chaotic in the real world! So, like everyone else, we buckle up, begin our detox then off we go, back to work between New York and London again...

Model and I had both been suffering from bad anxiety and Yogi is just Yogi, she just has always had it alllll figured out all the time =/ but we love her. She does have a few things right though, her state of mind, it is as light as a feather, because it comes with her job, just yoga, literally, all day errrday just teaching yoga, but about a year ago, she started studying nutrition because she wanted to come up with a fresh soothing recipe for her clients (that's what she says anyway) 

but she made us drink this "detox chill juice", not the actual name, we just called it our Chill juice because it really helped Model and I get over some inner freak demons we dealt with, especially on those days after a good night-out or when it got really hectic at work or just before visiting the family, God have mercy. Anyway, we started making this magic juice and mixing this secret formula: 

No added sugar ~ 0.1g fat ~ No concentrate ~ nothing nothing nothing but the above!

And for some reason, it tastes like spa water with those cucumbers in it and strangely, with a hint of lychee?! After about a week of this, I began having cooler moments than Yogi, which in my world is pretty freaking brilliant. Model wasn't panicking so much over her weight all the bloody time and finally started laying back. I have the drink nearly every morning and my revelation was: 'this is meditation in a bottle'.

 I was honestly never able to get myself to meditate, who on earth wanted to be left alone with their thoughts for that long!? I didn't know what would emerge from the eerie depths of my mind!! I have pretty dark humour you know! But now!!? I am able to sit for up to an hour in silence and completely free my mind from any thought that tried to sneak in and literally watch my thoughts like watching traffic from a hill and my thoughts were the cars driving past in the different colours and forms they came in, the madness was, it was just suddenly.. gone!

 Model's weight obsession was rather annoying because we had to be careful with what food or drink we had in the house, including wine. Yes, we were banned from wine in our own home. Mind you, we are three women in our mid-twenties under the same roof... with no wine. Back to topic. A moment to calm thy self... She only drinks gin and tonic because I believe that's the weight watching drink, but the clever one here suggested the cucumber extract added in the Unwind recipe to go with her Hendricks gin. So that war ended because, well, we all lost weight and it actually tastes quite magnificent.

 Yogi would mix the drink and put it in a glass jar, making it look very home-made and wonderful in her studio and actually did help some of the fidgety students in her meditation class to relax. People were responding to it. 

 Us, like anyone else, face the realities of today, the chaos and if not by feet, more so in the mind, the world becomes smaller by day and the more public one’s life gets due to the development of technology, the harder it seems to calm the mind and keep up at the same time. We drink coffee in the morning to be more alert and achieve as much as we can, then energy drinks by night to try to have as much energy and fun as we can. In between those hours, we long for a sense of calmness, so we go to Yoga classes now and try to meditate or keep watching The Secret or these new 'I am my own God' books or videos. But imagine if the moment you go on your lunch- break or after a work- out in your gym, and find a drink right next to the protein drinks and coconut waters that only wants to soothe and help your day? 

Riiiight? Right? Unwind has been mixed and played with the past year, between London, Stockholm, New York, LA and now we want to begin producing our ~meditation in a bottle~ all over the world and see how it goes… What do you think?" 

 To add to the excitement, we thought we would add a quote on the back for every new batch.. sort of like a fortune cookie! Just to brighten up your day a little :) Here is roughly how it will look: 

 So I have been calling and studying the past three months to find out how this works and we now have a set and ready plan, only problem is, it costs. A lot. So we need your help!

The Production and Supply procedures in their exact form and picture. From how it is made, and how with the help of planes, trucks or even the girls and I knocking on yoga and gym and juice centres to get them near you! Yes that's the girls and I. What?
1. (The Ingredient Suppliers)  + (Manufacturers supply) --> (Packagers) whom have a minimum order of 10,000L. We planned for Unwind to be in a refreshing little 330ml carton, so you can imagine the damage. That is a minimum order of 30,300 little cartons of Unwind drinks in a warehouse we need to rent. To further deliver by truck or send to fly out to the = (Distribution company) 

 2. The (Distribution company) will get a sample and a mock up first, if they like it, they will order rather many. But at wholesale. So we have to buy from the (Packagers) from our own pocket > and send to the (Distribution company) > So that also, costs. We want Unwind in every store and gym and yoga class near you, can you blame us? 

 3. (Marketing).... oh marketing. This is so the (Distribution company) wants more from us to be able to give more to you. And. In addition to this mission, we would like to start a campaign to raise awareness of inner peace and the effects and impact it has on one's entire life, because really, stress is what is causing this madness and then come the downward spiral where we turn to medicine or in my case, the hidden wine! But we would like to send a big message to all that it actually is all about you, what the real you wants in the midst of the chaos, and when you are able to see it clearly, you pretty much hold life in your open hand, and not the other way around! Namaste. 

So this is our calendar of when, how much and fingers crossssed, with your help, we can launch! 

Perks come in the month of Gifts: DECEMBER:::::::


The Stress Ball!

The can coooooler!

Light only when you are going to transform into a state and frequency of gratitude!


Your notebook story!


My couch got an umph...! :p


Come on now. I know what youre thinking. I thought it too. I wear it like a boss. He drank UNWiND, what now?

Nahhhmaste and do some yoga man!

The first batch has Rumi's quote on, you can have the tall Gin crystal glass with his quote engraved!


Ok so your name is Bond, but that must be the sexiest flask ever right!?


Probably the hippest flasks I have ever seen. Your name engraved on the stainless steel gun cartridge hip ass flask! Dude!! Wth!! Its freaking cool!! Please always have the drink in that! Even during day time! Just rock up to work, straight face, like what? Yes, this is my flask. What?


Come on.. just.. come on! Cant get cooler than meiiii


Get the fun slate coasters, tall crystal glass and one month of UNWiND!

Talk to the boss of Magic about how master your Universe, about how you want your life exactly to the crazy detail. How to detox your mind. Talk about anything you like he is a genius!

This is SPARTAAAAA

story:
Sean Harwell grew up as many kids did on the east side of buffalo.His parents moved in 1987 to escape the ills of the neighborhood. It wasn’t until 1997 that he faced his first tragedy, the lost of his eight-year-old sister to a heart ailment.This could have turned him bitter, but it made him love more.He turned his life to educating children. He worked at Martin Luther Christian School and George K Arthur Community Center. 

In 2007, he lost his first wife to nuero-endocrine cancer, And in 2010, his mother to brain cancer.In 2013, not being able to afford health insurance, Sean suffered a massive blood clot in his brain.Given only a 2% chance of living, With the support of his loving wife, his father, family and friends, he pulled through. 

Sean is father to five boys (3 of which are elementary school age). Before is tragic stroke he was the sole provider for his family.  He is not able to work now and is need of around the clock care. His family's finances have depleted. 

Currently, Sean resides is a second floor apartment with his wife and children, which is not conducive to getting to his appointments, and requires continued care. As the holiday season nears Sean is faced with re-gaining his speech, and ability to walk.... along with the concern of finding a new apartment suitable for his condition. 

Your help and prayers are desperately needed.
