story:
Wayne Miller is the son of Doctor Bruce Miller who discovered and developed an amazing compound unknown to the medical community and further developed it with Doctor Richard Kronenthal that would later be sold to a pharmaceutical company to be used as a cold sore medicine. Later Wayne Miller promoted Dr Miller to use the same technology to create and sell a skin healing rejuvenation cream with the same technology. The results were unparalleled. When it was discovered through anecdotal trials that the compound could relieve burn pain and heal intense burns, Doctor Millers son Wayne committed himself, as he has before with his fathers other discoveries, to making this available to burn victims through charitable means. Wayne and his team have spent the past year preparing, testing and strategizing with their own resources what has been required to get it prepared so that the FDA laboratory testing can be completed for an approved over the counter medication. The Un-Burn Team has contributed over $150k and hundreds of hours to date, while they work closely with Dr Miller and Dr Kronenthal in order to formulate, and prepare to distribute and fulfill this product. 

In any Burn accident the most important 1st stage is Burn pain relief to those who suffer in either domestic, on the job or in disaster and war torn events. Then in the 2nd stage reassuring that the ability for the skin organ to begin healing immediately and protecting the skins natural ability to restore the skin to its natural state. While prototyping some of the developed active ingredients and testing its proven healing ability, from Doctor Millers first hand experience with 2nd and 3rd degree burns, Dr Miller avoided skin graphs and surgery after 14 days of the formulas first topical use as demonstrated in the photo. The Un-Burn organization is raising funds to pay for finalizing the FDA lab tests and setting up the not-for profit that will seek and find partners to donate and support burn care centers, hospitals and other care facilities that can ensure that patients can benefit from this Amazing discovery.

Your contribution will help with the approximate $100k it will require to get FDA approval to distribute this as an over the counter medicine to victims of any kind of tragedy and disaster. If your heart aches as much as ours does when you see photos and videos of victims of disaster, accidents or war torn events, then you understand that it is an amazing gesture to offer relief to the afflicted especially when you see the face of an innocent child that is helpless from what they had no control over. Your financial aid to this effort will ensure that our team can succeed in fulfilling what you and Wayne Miller, Dr Miller's son, desires the most, relief and hope. We have outlined donation gifts that not only show our appreciation, but also may show to the rest of the burn community that you have been apart of our journey by naming contributors on our website who contribute $100 or more. Those who contribute $50 or more will receive samples as soon as the approval is complete which we have scheduled for 4 months or less.

Please forward and use the Indiegogo share tools to share this campaign to any of your friends, family or business associates that you feel would appreciate this effort as well. We greatly need your support and sincerely appreciate your taking the time to consider our mission. We hope you keep track of our progress and growth

@www.theunburncharity.org

Short Credentials

Doctor Bruce Millers humble beginnings in the Army reserves as a chiropractor led him to pursue his doctorate degree and then would later become an associate professor at Columbia Chiropractic College in New York. He also taught for the Florida Chiropractic Association, was on the Board of directors of Hillsborough county Chiropractic Society where he served as President, Treasurer, Secretary, and was on the ethics, public relations and scoliosis committees. In 1992 he received the Florida chiropractic association most supportive chiropractor for his dedication in consulting as the head chiropractic physician for a Tampa soccer team.  Bruce Miller helped found Bellamora International Group in 2010. There he served as Chairman of the board. 


Dr. Richard L. Kronenthal, PhD serves as the Chief Scientific Officer and Executive Vice President of Orthocon, Inc. Dr. Kronenthal founded Orthocon, Inc., in 2003. He is the Founder and Chief Scientific Officer of Abyrx, Inc. Since 1989, he has been the President of Kronenthal Associates, a consulting firm. From 1957 to 1989, he was employed by Ethicon, Inc., where he served as a Director of Research and Development and headed a major research project to develop a small diameter vascular graft. He joined Ethicon, a Johnson & Johnson Company, where he remained for 32 years, advancing through management to head their R&D division. He is a Polymer Chemist and a Consultant to medical product companies and venture capital groups. He began his Post-Doctoral Career as Senior Organic Chemist for the Colgate-Palmolive Company, where he was engaged in programs pertaining to synthetic organic chemistry, electro-organic chemistry, the chemistry of essential oils and chromatographic analysis. He has served as Chairman or President for five companies, as a Board Member for six companies and as Vice President for two corporations. He has been a Director of Corvita Corporation since 1991. He serves as a Director of Orthocon, Inc., Lukens Medical, and Direct Therapeutics Corporations. He serves on the Board of External Advisors of Steven Institute of Technology. He also serves as a Scientific Advisor of Ventures Medical, SEA Ventures Inc., Acusphere, Inc., Mericle Corporation, Melanx Corporation, Ortec International and Chitogenics. He was awarded the prestigious Johnson Medal for Research and Development and led the development of many successful programs including Coated Vicryl and PDS Sutures, two of the most successful medical devices in the industry. He has authored fifteen publications and holds twenty US patents in the chemical and health care fields. Dr. Kronenthal earned a Bachelor of Science degree from Brooklyn College and was awarded a Doctorate in Organic Chemistry from the Polytechnic Institute of New York.

story:
Our company

We are a growing company that has a passion to help people. We want to creat a world where people can be what they want to be and do what they want to do regardless of their disability.


What We Need

Our company wants to provide Bionic Eleg's to different people around the world %100 free for families that can not afford them but desperately need them. In order to do this we need to raise $50,000 by february 15th everything counts thank you.

The Impact

You can help change the world as we know it with Bionic Eleg Technology people don't have to look at a wheelchair as their only source of transportation,we are in a new age of technology so lets embrace it and help people walk with their own 2 feet.

Other Ways You Can Help

You can also help by sending this link to friends and family and telling about this new development of technology.

story:
Last month, I was in a pretty bad bike accident. There was construction on 7th avenue, and no warning signs. It was dark out, and I didn't see the huge gap in the road. In seconds, I went from this:

To this:

I believe in the power of positivity. It has been a tough journey, but it's taught me a lot about myself, about what I value in life. My neck and nose are sprained, my teeth are cracked and some were knocked out (I spat out an entire tooth, onto the road, like a boss), and I'm still concussed. 

On the bright side, there are songs like "All I want for Christmas is My Two Front Teeth" which brings me to the biggest lesson I've learned out of all this: don't forget to laugh at yourself. 

The journey is far from over. By this time next year, I hope to have two new teeth in my mouth. That's where you come in. Help me fix my teeth! And if you do, I'll sing you any song you like. What can you do but enjoy the lisp while it lasts, right?

What can you do but enjoy the lisp while it lasts, right?

story:
Today we received some news, Grisel has cancer. We are all still in shock and disbelief. She has additional testing this week which will provide us with more information. Within the next couple weeks she will have surgery to remove the tumor and I will be traveling to the Dominican to be with her while she goes through the surgery and begins the treatment process. I’m hoping to leave this week.

Seven months ago God blessed Grisel and I with a beautiful baby girl Gabriela. We are both so lucky to have her in our lives she brings us so much joy and happiness. Through this difficult time being a mother to Gabriela has given Grisel the strength she needs to face the battle ahead. My family and I ask for your prayers and strength. We will keep you updated as we receive more information.

With this we will be incurring many unforeseen expenses. A fundraiser has been planned in hopes of raising funds for some of the following; specialist treatments not covered by basic medical, travel expenses, special dietary needs and the days I will miss from work, just to name a few.

Thank you and God Bless.

story:
Your Contribution

Thank you for taking the time to visit this page. Your contribution will be used to create an environment where the body can easily and readily accept a customized Sound Healing Session of selected tones and frequencies for healing, stress relief, and/or facilitation for meditation in this very busy, very loud city that we all love! 

Providing a soundproof environment will support the body to receive sound therapy on a whole new level.  The one thing you can’t dial up is quiet, and the inner stillness that lies beneath it.  And yet it’s more important for our mental, physical and spiritual health than almost anything.

This work is incredibly important.  By contributing, even the smallest amount, you'll be able to receive updates of how the project is progressing even after the campaign is complete.  You will also be invited to the opening party where I hope to thank you personally for your generosity and loving support.   

Let's continue the conversation!  I have created a Facebook Group for any and all questions you may have.    https://www.facebook.com/groups/697460543620759/

A Little About Me

Hi! My name is Danielle Hall and I am a certified Sound Healer, Reiki Master, and Cyma Practitioner based in San Francisco, California.  

I am also a military brat, (GF) macaroni and cheese lover, not-so-secret Korean Drama enthusiast, the oldest of 3, and the best cheerleader to have by your side.  

Growing up, music had always been an outlet for me.  Whether it was playing alto saxophone in band or singing in choir I was always doing something with music.  It was the only thing that really kept my spirits up while trying not to focus on the “on again, off again” of my health issues. 

Fast forward to me as an adult, 2010 to be exact, I became really sick. 

Sick to the point of it not even being my “normal” sick!  My hair was falling out, I was loosing the enamel on my teeth, had heated headaches above my eyes, lumps in my breasts, as well as a few other disturbing issues that I will keep to myself for now… Then, I found out that all my health problems from a young age were the result of a serious gluten allergy.  (WHAT?!?!) 

Fast forward again, to 2013.  Three years of knowing what healthy actually feels like.  Three years of rapid personal growth.  Within three years I had the opportunity to meet and experience who I really am because I didn’t have to pretend to be someone I wasn’t, healthy and happy, because I REALLY WAS.   

And Sound

Now, lets fast forward to today.  I believe everything in my life has set me up for being able to help people in the capacity I am today.  It seems to have come full circle bringing me back to something I have always loved and have found as a sanctuary. Sound. 

Through my studies and certification in Sound Healing and Energy Work, I have learned how sound affects the body and how to use it to help others reduce stress, boost immune system functions, and the facilitation of meditation so that they, you, can live the healthy, active lifestyle you love waking up to everyday… Something that I have been able to experience fully, and am so grateful for, in the past three years and in years to come.       


The Need & What You Get

What is Needed:

  • $14,000 --> There are not many corners you can cut when it comes to a sound proof room.  We are building a "floating room" which is basically a room within a room.  The interior materials of the space used for absorption and dispersing sound adds up quick.  They are also incredibly ugly.  Not what you would call relaxing  in anyway.  We are creating a space that functions the way we need it to but also looks and feels good to be in.   
  • Labor --> Its not just the materials. 
  • This room will also be built to be able to move to a new location as Soundembrace grows.  That way, the investment can live on as more and more growth happens with the business. 

What You Get:

  • To the right you will see the different teirs of what is offered to you as a gift for contributing.  Below is the same breakdown:

    1. Major shout outs on Facebook and Twitter!  As well as all contributors names framed together and hung in the studio you helped to build!
    2. Receive a 10 min mp3 downloadable recording of the quartz crystal singing bowl for the Sacral Chakra 
    3. Soundembrace Sticker!!!
    4. Receive a 5x7 hand cut wood print made by San Francisco artist, Nathalie Roland, AKA Headphone Record. http://headphonerecord.com
    5. Receive a gift Certificate for hourly sound healing sessions in the sound proof room you helped to build! (or choose distance healings through Skype. You may also gift the Certificate to a friend)
    6. Group Sound Healing Session with up to 5 of your friends (that is 6 people including you!)

  • I will be posting photos and videos of the progress so you can see how you are helping!  Even if I do not receive the full amount, 100% of what is raised will go to this build out.  

The Impact

“Sound Healing is founded on the premise that all matter is vibrating at specific frequencies. Science has proven that sound, or vibration, has a strong impact upon substance.

For example, the study of Cymatics has shown how sound creates geometric patterns in matter. Dr. Emoto has proven that sound changes the molecular structure of water. However, more importantly, sound changes consciousness. Many ancient civilizations and modern indigenous cultures have used sound to heal and access higher levels of consciousness for thousands of years.

The medical community also uses sound and music in a variety of applications such as: during surgery to relieve pain, to break up gallstones and to relax muscles using ultrasound. Doctors are now finding the resonant frequency of organs in order to help vibrate them back into a healthy state. What is most exciting is the cutting-edge research that shows how sound might be used to disintegrate diseases such as cancer.”  (Source: Sound and Consciousness Institute)

Sending specific tones and frequencies through the meridians allows for deep penetration into each cell, organ, and nerve to relive pain, relax the body, boost immune system functions, balance chakras, clear blockages from the meridians, and even release stuck emotions that are the cause of so much dis-ease within the body.

  • Sound Healing is a Non-Invasive Healing modality.  
  • When it comes to health care, the American mindset is changing.  More and more people are exploring options outside of conventional medicine, searching for optimal wellness and prevention. 
  • According to the National Institutes of Health, nearly 40% of American adults now use some type of complimentary or alternative medicine. 
  • Nearly 50% reported using complimentary or alternative medicine because their prescribed medications were ineffective and almost two-thirds of the patients found CAM (complimentary or alternative medicine) helpful. 

  • The number of hospitals integrating these practices with traditional Western medicine has grown  from 8% in 1998 to 27% today.  And top institutions such as the Mayo Clinic Johns Hopkins and Standford  now offer degrees in integrative medicine.

    Let's continue the conversation!  I have created a Facebook Group for any and all questions you may have.    https://www.facebook.com/groups/697460543620759/

Other Ways You Can Help

Another way you can help is to spread the word!
 
Please share this with your friends and family.  Share it on all of your favorite social media websites.  You can use the use the Indiegogo share tools to pass it on. 

Thank you in advance for your love and support!

Danielle Hall

“Sound can redress imbalances on every level of physiologic functioning and can play a positive role in the treatment of virtually any medical disorder.”

Dr. Mitchell Gaynor, Author of “The Healing Power of Sound: Recovery from Life-Threatening Illness using Sound, Voice, and Music, Director of Medical Oncology and Integrative Medicine at Strang-Cornell Cancer Prevention Center

I will be posting photos and videos of the progress so you can see how you are helping!  Even if I do not receive the full amount, 100% of what is raised will go to this build out.  

The Impact“Sound Healing is founded on the premise that all matter is vibrating at specific frequencies. Science has proven that sound, or vibration, has a strong impact upon substance.For example, the study of Cymatics has shown how sound creates geometric patterns in matter. Dr. Emoto has proven that sound changes the molecular structure of water. However, more importantly, sound changes consciousness. Many ancient civilizations and modern indigenous cultures have used sound to heal and access higher levels of consciousness for thousands of years.The medical community also uses sound and music in a variety of applications such as: during surgery to relieve pain, to break up gallstones and to relax muscles using ultrasound. Doctors are now finding the resonant frequency of organs in order to help vibrate them back into a healthy state. What is most exciting is the cutting-edge research that shows how sound might be used to disintegrate diseases such as cancer.”  (Source: Sound and Consciousness Institute)Sending specific tones and frequencies through the meridians allows for deep penetration into each cell, organ, and nerve to relive pain, relax the body, boost immune system functions, balance chakras, clear blockages from the meridians, and even release stuck emotions that are the cause of so much dis-ease within the body.
Sound Healing is a Non-Invasive Healing modality.  
When it comes to health care, the American mindset is
changing.  More and more people are
exploring options outside of conventional medicine, searching for optimal
wellness and prevention. 
According to the National Institutes of Health, nearly 40%
of American adults now use some type of complimentary or alternative medicine. 
Nearly 50% reported using
complimentary or alternative medicine because their prescribed medications were
ineffective and almost two-thirds of the patients found CAM (complimentary or
alternative medicine) helpful. 

The number of hospitals integrating these practices with
traditional Western medicine has grown 
from 8% in 1998 to 27% today.  And
top institutions such as the Mayo Clinic Johns Hopkins and Standford  now offer degrees in integrative medicine.Let's continue the conversation!  I have created a Facebook Group for any and all questions you may have.    https://www.facebook.com/groups/697460543620759/

Other Ways You Can HelpAnother way you can help is to spread the word! Please share this with your friends and family.  Share it on all of your favorite social media websites.  You can use the use the Indiegogo share tools to pass it on. Thank you in advance for your love and support!Danielle Hall“Sound can redress imbalances on every level of physiologic functioning and can play a positive role in the treatment of virtually any medical disorder.”Dr. Mitchell Gaynor, Author of “The Healing Power of Sound: Recovery from Life-Threatening Illness using Sound, Voice, and Music, Director of Medical Oncology and Integrative Medicine at Strang-Cornell Cancer Prevention Center

story:
Wesley Stubbs needs our help.

Wes was working at Albuquerque Comic Con as a member of the security team and assisting with the Amtgard Live Action Role Playing group.  Wes was not at the top of his game and we have learned that his heart attack was beginning around then.  He did not let his tiredness keep him from from contributing.  2 days later he had to call an ambulance due to his massive heart attack.

After he got home, he had a stroke.

Wes is a father to a young lady and little boy and friend to many. He did not have insurance when this happened. 

Wes was signed up for a type of insurance to give a little help for his stay in the hospital but it is not going to cover everything.  At the time of setting this up, he will have been in the hospital 6 days.  He is not expected to be released anytime soon.  In addition to a cardiac diet, he is only allowed a limited amount of liquids.  This is expected to be a lifetime restriction. 

Wes is going to need help with current and future medical costs relating to the ambulance ride, hospital stay, medications, rehabilitation, and his rent while he is out of work.  While I do not know his exact bills (they continue to increase), I set a nominal goal of $10,000.

In my experience in the medical field and as a patient for far milder reasons, I can say that this is very much on the low end of what is needed.  This is just a start.

If you can't help with funds, share and promote this campaign for our friend Wes.
